titulo: Data Engineer & Scientist - NLP and AI
empresa_nome: Nexilis Legal Assets - Intellectual & Financial Capital
qtd_candidatos: Mais de 100 candidaturas
jobs_description: We are a startup dedicated to transforming the legal profession and the delivery of justice through data. We "read" and "interpret" massive case files of lawsuits being adjudicated in Civil (Consumer) courts in Brazil, and help our clients predict outcomes and define their optimal litigation strategies based on sound quantitative techniques. Our clients are large corporations, mostly in the financial sector. We are quickly expanding our team to increase our delivery capability to our clients. Responsibilities You will be the chief person responsible for our algorithms and strategies to collect, structure and interpret data, which comes mostly as free-form text from PDF files written in Portuguese, but also as hybrid forms (images or tables merged with text). You will take over our existing code base, and will have total freedom and responsibility to increase the breadth, accuracy and speed of our data mining, develop new predictive models for feature labeling and final case outcome, and for suggesting new use cases for our collected data. Qualifications We are looking for a highly curious and knowledgeable person with mastery in NLP, ML and AI tools. The successful candidate will have 3+ years of experience working with NLP, ML and AI, and will have mastered: Common mining strategies: simple and complex regular expressions, tokenization, lemmatization, text vectorization ML and AI algorithms for correct labeling Treatment of hybrid entities (images and tables merged with text) ML predictions for binary, continuous and time outcomes Tools/frameworks: Python, pandas, numpy, sklearn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, nltk, spacy, fitz, pdfPlumber, basic CloudOps Knowledge of Language Models is a plus.

jobs_description: Somos uma empresa global, líder em serviços de informação, conhecida no restante do mundo como Experian. Nos grandes momentos da vida, como a compra de um carro, a ida de um filho para a faculdade ou mesmo a abertura e expansão de um negócio, estamos presentes para empoderar consumidores e clientes a administrarem seus dados com confiança. Contamos com mais de 20.000 pessoas operando em mais de 44 países; e, ao investirmos nelas, em tecnologia e em inovação, podemos ajudar negócios a se transformar e comunidades a prosperar, permitindo que mais pessoas se sintam incluídas nas oportunidades disponíveis. É dessa forma que todos os dias entregamos o nosso propósito de criar um futuro melhor. Venha descobrir um mundo inesperado com a gente. Job Description Área: DA-Regions Subárea: Governance & Risk Management Nós construímos soluções para melhoria de nossos produtos através das técnicas de análise de dados, descoberta de conhecimento, business intelligence e modelos de machine learning para a prevenção de fraudes dos nossos produtos. Quais serão suas principais entregas? Criação e manutenção de pipeline de dados para o Lakehouse; Análise e visualização de dados para Business Intelligence; Criação e implantação de modelos de Machine Learning; Processamento distribuído utilizando ferramentas de Big Data. titulo: Director, Global Process Excellence, Requisition to Pay (R2P)
jobs_description: Building on our past. Ready for the future Worley is a global professional services company of energy, chemicals and resources experts headquartered in Australia.? Right now, we’re bridging two worlds as we accelerate to more sustainable energy sources, while helping our customers provide the energy, chemicals and resources that society needs now. We partner with our customers to deliver projects and create value over the life of their portfolio of assets. We solve complex problems by finding integrated data-centric solutions from the first stages of consulting and engineering to installation and commissioning, to the last stages of decommissioning and remediation. Join us and help drive innovation and sustainability in our projects. The Role The Director, Global Process Excellence, Requisition to Pay (R2P) will set our global vision and strategy for Worley’s end-to-end Requisition to Pay (R2P) Processes, own the process design to drive optimisation, performance and compliance across all geographies, functions, and business units, leveraging the delivery capability in the organisation to enable Worley’s strategic aspirations. Establish our vision and drive strategic direction, optimize Worley’s end-to-end processes, and create a greater experience for our people. The Director, Global Process Excellence will have significant authority, to fundamentally shift the way processes are owned and managed at Worley. Be a critical enabler in the establishment of a global process framework at Worley. Focus on end-to-end process design, documentation, and architecture including data, controls, and policies. Monitor process performance and compliance. L ocation – WFH/Hybrid/Office in Worley entity locations Please ensure you attach an English language version of your CV/Resume Responsibilities Will Include R2P Process Strategy Establishing targets and KPIs Running Process Boards to agree the process transformation roadmap In scope processes include requisitioning, purchasing, receiving, invoice processing and payment, C-card administration, and AP period-end close. R2P Process Design Benchmark processes and identify gaps Define global process taxonomy and design including controls, master data governance standards and end-to-end process Continuous improvement in process design Documentation of global process blueprints, procedures, local exceptions, and changes R2P Process Oversight Oversee the monitoring and analysis of process compliance and performance Establish and maintain process-level master data standards Monitor process audit outcomes, and projects across process area to inform and drive improvement initiatives R2P Programme & Project Management Review and approve or reject projects based on strategic relevance and feasibility Initiate project launch, case for change, outline project plan, change management and resourcing Continuous monitoring of inflight transformation Accountable for budget for end-to-end transformation initiatives About You A seasoned professional with significant deep, global, end-to-end Requisition to Pay (R2P) process expertise. A leader who thrives in a global, complex and matrix organisation. A proven track record of managing complex programme portfolios and delivering measurable success. Excellence in process improvement, change management, Agile Methodology, Six Sigma, Lean, Innovation Methodology, and Design Thinking (a certification is desirable). You must possess end-to-end process ownership, and management methodologies and consistently drive process improvements. Utilise process mapping, analysis, and optimisation techniques to identify and implement improvements, and streamline operations. You are familiar with ERP systems, workflow automation tools, and data management systems coupled with a strong understanding of IT governance and security principles. Experience in utilizing data analytics tools and techniques to drive process insights. Knowledge of KPIs and metrics used to measure process performance. As a strategic thinker, you can identify innovative solutions and drive successful outcomes. Experience in aligning process improvements with strategic objectives, familiar with business strategy frameworks and methodologies. Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills that enable you to address complex process challenges. Your communication and work style enable you to influence and engage stakeholders at all levels and gain by-in and successful outcomes. A dynamic leadership style who successfully leads cross-functional teams. Sophisticated ability to develop and execute change management strategies to ensure successful implementation of new processes. Highly proficient in Microsoft Suite, especially in Excel and PowerPoint. Experience in working with relevant tech platforms to enable process optimisation. Qualifications - degree or higher-level business qualification/s in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance or relevant functional area Moving forward together We want our people to be energized and empowered to drive sustainable impact. So, our focus is on a values-inspired culture that unlocks brilliance through belonging, connection and innovation. We’re building a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace. Creating a space where everyone feels they belong, can be themselves, and are heard. And we're not just talking about it; we're doing it. We're reskilling our people, leveraging transferable skills, and supporting the transition of our workforce to become experts in today's low carbon energy infrastructure and technology. Whatever your ambition, there’s a path for you here. And there’s no barrier to your potential career success. Join us to broaden your horizons, explore diverse opportunities, and be part of delivering sustainable change. Company Worley Primary Location BRA-Rio de Janeiro Other Locations AUS-WA-Perth, COL-CPD-Bogotá, GBR-Greater London, ZAF-GT-Johannesburg, Argentina, AUS-NSW-Sydney Job Transition & Change Management Schedule Full-time Employment Type Employee Job Level Manager Job Posting Apr 4, 2024 Unposting Date May 4, 2024 Reporting Manager Title Senior VP Supply Chain

jobs_description: Quais são os desafios deste cargo? A gerência de Data & Analytics do Grupo Fleury está na linha de frente, participando da evolução digital da cia com propósito e estratégia bem definidos e foco em se tornar referência em IA na organização e no ambiente Health Care , transformando dados em ativos estratégicos. Os profissionais atuam como parceiros das áreas de negócio na resolução de DESAFIOS de ANALYTICS e INTELIGENCIA ARTIFICIAL, através de técnicas robustas que amparem a tomada de decisão, disseminando a cultura DATA DRIVEN e possibilitando que cada vez mais times tomem decisões baseadas em dados. Além disso, também são responsáveis por gerenciar e otimizar toda a camada de dados da corporação, garantindo qualidade, segurança e eficiência no uso da informação para impulsionar e alavancar a estratégia da cia. A pessoa que assumir essa posição terá como desafios criar soluções em data science, explorando técnicas atuais para análise de grandes volumes de dados (estruturados ou não), construindo modelos de IA que apoiem as áreas de negócios na tomada de decisão. Deve ter expertise em modelar problemas complexos, identificar padrões, tendências ocultas e oportunidades nos dados para gerar insights por meio de técnicas estatísticas, algoritmos de Machine Learning e IA e ferramentas de visualização. Terá como objetivo construir relações entre equipes que fortaleçam o Grupo e contribuam para ampliar nossos impactos positivos para os pacientes, e para isso é necessário gostar de atuar em ambiente altamente dinâmico e bastante relacional, se identificando com a missão de qualidade e segurança do paciente. Enquanto hard skills essa pessoa será responsável por utilizar conhecimento avançado em MLOps no deploy de modelos de machine learning para implementação de algoritmos computacionais para novas plataformas tecnológicas e melhorias de fluxos; treinar Data Scientist I, Data Scientist II e os usuários internos, além de ajudar a difundir a cultura data-driven no grupo e produzir modelos preditivos e prescritivos, sempre visando garantir a qualidade nos processos e a melhoria na segurança dos pacientes. Buscamos um profissional que apresente: Necessário graduação completa em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Estatística, Matemática ou área correlata; Desejável: Especialização/Mestrado na área de computação; Necessário capacidade de criar e colocar em produção modelos de análise estatística e machine learning (MLOps); Necessário experiência em modelagem de dados, técnicas computacionais em probabilidade e estatística, machine learning(Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow), banco de dados (SQL e NoSQL); Necessário experiência em ambientes Cloud (AWS, GCP ou Azure) Necessário experiência com programação (Python); Desejável experiência em desenvolvimento com PySpark; Desejável experiência em trabalhar em Linux; Desejável conhecer metodologias ágeis; Desejável experiência com dados de saúde (desfecho); Desejável experiência em Pacote Office Inglês intermediário Desejável experiência com ferramentas de gestão de projetos (Jira, Project) Desejável domínio em apresentações de resultados para stakeholders Desejável visão estratégica (de negócios) Principais atividades: Assessorar a elaboração de briefing de estudos de Data Science Assessorar o levantamento de requisitos para projetos de Analytics Liderar projetos de Data Science, desde a concepção até a implementação. Desenvolver soluções complexas de machine learning para problemas específicos. Construir pipelines completos de data science e integração de sistemas de dados. Elaborar/revisar a documentação de todo o processo parametrizado em sistema, para evitar perda de conhecimento. Elaborar relatórios gerenciais e apresentar para stakeholders. Desenvolver pipelines de dados, que incluem: ingestão, transformação, análise, visualização e apresentação dos dados. Produzir modelos preditivos através de dados da área técnica. Trabalhar com maneiras de manipular dados em grande quantidade (Big Data). Construir banco de dados. Consumir dados e transformá-los em informações úteis para a companhia. Produzir ferramentas capazes de facilitar a disponibilização dos dados para os clientes internos e externos. Adequação de metodologias e boas práticas no desenvolvimento de processos envolvendo manipulação de dados. Zelar pela qualidade no desenvolvimento de algoritmos em prol da segurança de processo e do paciente. Modelo de Trabalho: Modelo de trabalho: Remoto Carga horária mensal: 220 horas Horários: 08h00 às 17h48 O que oferecemos: 🩺 Assistência Médica; 🦷 Assistência odontológica; 🛒 Vale alimentação; 🍽️ Vale refeição; 🏫 Auxílio creche; 🏥 Seguro de vida; 💪 Gympass; 💰 Participação nos Lucros; 📄 Previdência privada; 🧬 Benefícios exclusivos para promover a saúde e bem-estar dos colaboradores e seus dependentes. Trabalhamos para promover a cultura inclusiva que busca a equidade e valoriza as diferenças. Para conhecer mais sobre o Grupo Fleury, acesse o site: http://www.grupofleury.com.br

jobs_description: Join the CloudWalk Wolfpack as a MLOps Engineer. Your Mission: At CloudWalk, we're at the cutting edge of AI, pioneering the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to drive innovation. As a MLOps Engineer, you will play a critical role in operationalizing the visionary work of our LLM Data Scientists. Your expertise will ensure the smooth deployment, efficient management, and scalable performance of LLMs across our extensive infrastructure. Your contributions will turn advanced AI research into scalable, high-performance solutions, with a particular focus on optimizing network communication and parallel processing capabilities. What You’ll Do: Deploy and Manage LLMs: Employ Kubernetes, Terraform, and cloud services to deploy and scale LLMs efficiently, ensuring their adaptability to high-demand scenarios. Optimize Computing Infrastructure: Focus on enhancing GPU utilization, distributed training, bandwidth efficiency between machines, and VPC connections to maximize system performance. Leverage Cutting-Edge Technologies: Utilize libraries such as Hugging Face's Accelerate and PyTorch's torchrun to facilitate parallel training across multiple machines in a cluster, optimizing our AI models' training and inference processes. Collaborate on Innovation: Partner with our R&D team to transition LLM and RAG technologies from conceptual stages to scalable, production-ready systems. Monitor and Improve System Performance: Implement advanced monitoring and logging practices to ensure system reliability and performance, continuously seeking improvements. Stay Updated on Industry Advances: Actively pursue the latest developments in MLOps, cloud computing, and AI technologies to implement innovative solutions and maintain our infrastructure's leading edge. Technologies You Will Work With: Kubernetes, Terraform, and cloud computing platforms for scalable AI model deployment. CI/CD pipelines, Git for version control, and Bash scripting for operational efficiency. Hugging Face's Accelerate and PyTorch's torchrun for parallel training and optimization across multiple machines. A comprehensive understanding of network infrastructure to optimize bandwidth and secure VPC connections is essential. What We Expect From You: Technical Mastery: Solid experience with DevOps, cloud infrastructure, and deploying machine learning models. Expertise in network optimization and parallel computing is crucial. Problem-Solving Mindset: The ability to navigate complex challenges, strategically manage resources, and improve system efficiency. Collaborative Approach: Strong communication skills and the ability to contribute effectively within a dynamic, interdisciplinary team. Lifelong Learner: A commitment to continuous learning, staying abreast of the latest technological advancements, and applying innovative solutions. Why CloudWalk? By joining CloudWalk, you become part of a team that's reshaping the future with technological innovations. We cherish creativity, teamwork, and a dedication to excellence. Here, your work contributes to a mission of driving forward technological advancements. Dare to innovate, dare to impact, dare to join the Wolfpack. Apply now!

jobs_description: Company Description Visa is a world leader in digital payments, facilitating more than 215 billion payments transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses and economies to thrive. When you join Visa, you join a culture of purpose and belonging – where your growth is priority, your identity is embraced, and the work you do matters. We believe that economies that include everyone everywhere, uplift everyone everywhere. Your work will have a direct impact on billions of people around the world – helping unlock financial access to enable the future of money movement. Join Visa: A Network Working for Everyone. Job Description Visa is seeking a team member based in Sao Paulo who will play a pivotal role in developing and implementing campaign measurement methodologies and processes for both client and core Visa LAC marketing campaigns. The role encompasses leading third-party vendor teams to measure the impact of these campaigns. The role involves hands-on activities such as the development and execution of campaign measurement methodologies and processes, using either traditional or advanced statistical and automation approaches. It also involves creating documentation, as well as aligning presenting and negotiating with internal stakeholders. Specific Responsibilities For This Role Include Design, develop and deploy standard methods and processes for measuring the performance and impact of Visa LAC client and core marketing campaigns. Automation of measurement solutions and models. Design and develop automation of measurement solutions and models using various tools and technologies, as well as optimize and improve the performance and quality of automation solutions and processes. Leverage Visa data, technology, and industry expertise to ensure consistent and accurate measurement of marketing campaigns across LAC. Keep abreast of the latest trends and best practices in marketing measurement and analytics, and present new ideas to enhance Visa's current measurement capabilities. Align the data and insights with the business objectives, understand the challenges and opportunities, and provide actionable recommendations based on the measurement results. Collaborate with both internal and external stakeholders to define the scope and objectives of the analysis and initiatives that support marketing campaign measurement. Lead and manage third-party vendor teams to deliver timely and quality measurement reports and insights for Visa LAC core and client campaigns. This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 set days a week (determined by leadership/site), with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs. Qualifications Basic Qualifications 8+ years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor’s Degree or at least 5 years of experience with an Advanced Degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD) or 2 years of work experience with a PhD, OR 11+ years of relevant work experience. Preferred Qualifications 9 or more years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor Degree or 7 or more relevant years of experience with an Advanced Degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD) or 3 or more years of experience with a PhD BA, BS required. MBA or other relevant Masters degree preferred (eg: Statistics, Computer Science, and Engineering). More than 8 years of relevant industry experience in analytics CRM in a leading commercial brand or management consulting (with relevant industry experience in retail, financial services, payment), or retail banking management experience. Previous experience on studies on consumer behavior, marketing campaign targeting and effectiveness and CLTV. Experience in big data analytics and statistical modeling in SAS including SAS E. Miner, SAS E. Guide and SPSS. Work with large volumes of data. Extract and manipulate large datasets using standard tools such as Hadoop Ecosystem, Apache Spark, SAS, through scripting in Python, SQL, Java etc. Hands-on skills in cleaning, manipulating, analyzing, visualizing and modeling large data sets. Transform data and analysis to executive business language . Ability to lead and mentor diverse teams of data scientists, engineers, and other technical professionals Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach in order to improve current business practices within Visa. Excellent project management and organizational and presentational skills. Self-motivated, results oriented individual with the ability to handle numerous projects concurrently. Ideal candidates should be motivated, data-driven, and analytic, capable of delivering strategic thought leadership, diagnosing problems, and providing high-impact solutions to support business growth and performance. Candidates should also have solid experience in developing enduring, strategic relationships across the Visa organization. Additional Information Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

jobs_description: Job Description A primeira coisa que você precisa saber é que aqui você não vai cair na rotina. A Radix desenvolve soluções para empresas de diferentes setores e indústrias. Quer fazer parte dessa história e transformar ideias e sonhos em realidade? #VemPraRadix Responsibilities and assignments Buscamos pessoas que queiram somar e fazer parte de um ecossistema que leva inovação, tecnologia e soluções para os mais diversos segmentos do mercado. Por aqui, os desafios são constantes e você não vai cair na rotina. Como Profissional de Ciência de Dados você vai: Utilizar scripts Python para extração, transformação e armazenamento de dados, com foco no consumo de API, especialmente GraphQL. Extrair, transformar e armazenar dados. Implementar e manter pipelines de dados robustos para garantir o bom fluxo de dados. Conceber e implementar modelos de dados eficazes para apoiar os requisitos comerciais. Automatizar ferramentas de elaboração de relatórios e de visualização de dados em Power BI + Python. Apoiar tecnicamente a equipe nos momentos de necessidade/maiores dificuldades. Trabalhar hands-on (programação em Python, visualizações em Power BI, modelação de dados, projetos de Machine Learning e Data Science), sempre que necessário. Priorizar o backlog do time de acordo com a capacidade. Auxiliar em preparação de apresentações de resultados para diretores e gerentes. Requirements And Qualifications Para essa vaga, você deve ter: Conhecimento básico em programação e orientação a objetos; Conhecer Machine Learning/Análise de Dados: Limpeza e análise estatística de dados / Aprendizado supervisionado: regressão, classificação. Proficiência em scripts Python para extração, transformação, enriquecimento e armazenamento de dados, com experiência no consumo de API, especialmente GraphQL. jobs_description: BRP is looking for a Data Analyst to join its team and take the global analytical practice to the next level. We are looking for a motivated individual who thrives in a dynamic, challenging environment, who loves working with state-of-the-art tools, and who knows how to solve complex problems with innovative solutions. In this role, you will be at the heart of the implementation of world-class analytical solutions and help make data a strategic advantage for BRP. You’ll Have The Opportunity To Establish and maintain the overall enterprise data model, working closely with the business lines, data governance team and data engineers across the organization. Capture business requirements to establish relational, dimensional or data vault data models to support different data use cases. Review data models proposed by data engineers, analysts and scientists in order to optimize them, align them with the global model, and operationalize them, while ensuring adherence to industry standards and laws related to GDPR and SOX. Define and implement the architecture elements that will ensure the timeliness, quality, security and availability of data Continuously improve the BI platform architecture, from raw data capture to the presentation layer Be a leader in defining best practices and creative thinking YOU’LL THRIVE IN THIS ROLE IF YOU HAVE THE FOLLOWING SKILLS AND QUALITIES: Master Degree in Business Intelligence or equivalent Solid and demonstrated experience on following various modeling techniques: Relational Dimensional Data Vault 2.0 Team-worker, open-minded and always willing to discuss the proposed model or approach to be taken Highly organized, able to build a "game plan", and prioritize own tasks with conflicting delivery dates Constantly comes up with creative ideas for improvement, and loves to get my hands on new technologies. Excellent oral and written communicator, in French and English, able to prepare and make executive presentations Experience in working in an agile delivery model Experience with SAP is a plus THE ROAD SHOULD BELONG TO EVERYONE. We still live in a world where many feel the road is for other people. We believe we can make a difference. Moving people goes beyond making innovative products. We strive to nurture our people’s aspirations, to exceed our riders’ expectations and stand in solidarity with all the communities that ride with us. Building a more inclusive BRP with no barriers for those who seek to ride starts from within, and we need everyone's commitment, drive and dedication to make it a reality. WELCOME TO BRP We’re a world leader in recreational vehicles and boats, creating innovative ways to move on snow, water, asphalt, dirt and even in the air. Headquartered in the Canadian town of Valcourt, Quebec, our company is rooted in a spirit of ingenuity and intense customer focus. Today, we operate manufacturing facilities in Canada, the United States, Mexico, Finland, Australia and Austria, with a workforce made up of close to 23,000 spirited people, all driven by the deeply held belief that at work, as with life itself, it’s not about the destination; It’s about the journey. This position is based in Campinas, Brazil and is eligible to the BRP Employee Referral Program. You will have the opportunity to work in hybrid mode, 2 to 3 days in the office.

jobs_description: Who we are: VAAS revolutionizes decision making through an intelligent, streamlined platform. Merging multiple datasources for complete insights, including on-chain and off-chain data, we provide a highly intuitive, customizable tool for any team, ensuring effective decision-making with the use of AI. About the job: As a Data Engineer at Vaas, your primary role will be to build, maintain, and optimize data pipelines. Your expertise will transform raw data into relevant insights that can power decision making through dashboards and user-oriented interfaces. You’ll be part of data-driven projects to provide valuable insights and extract knowledge using scientific methods, processes, algorithms and new technology. Location: Hybrid work model at Florianópolis. A remote position is NOT available. What you’ll work on: Build the infrastructure required for optimal data ETL. Collect raw data from various data sources. Set up automated processes for the best data delivery architecture. Improve our current data pipelines. Wrangle data into a usable state that are ready to be used by the team. Work together with data analysts to help build awesome and scalable analytics. Collaborate with the team in creating robust and scalable dashboards. Who you are: You’re excited about Data! You’re fluent in the data science tech stack: DBT, Airflow, Python, Bigquery, Dataflow, SQL, and containers to run it all. You have the ability to translate business problems into a data science roadmap and computational tasks. You take pride in your code. It's readable, functional, and reproducible. Familiarity with AI & ML workflows is favorable. Familiarity with Metabase is a plus, or similar data visualization tools. As part of the VAAS team, you'll embody our culture of innovation and dedication. We're not just looking for a colleague; we're looking for someone who will be with us for the long haul, contributing to and sharing in our successes. If you are ready to embrace a challenge and build a future within the dynamic sphere of blockchain technology, come and forge your path with us!

jobs_description: Job Description O que é a área de Modelagem da Porto Bank? Criação de soluções e modelos preditivos com o objetivo de apoiar as equipes de produtos e políticas da Porto Bank, visando alcançar ótimos resultados nas decisões estratégicas. Responsibilities and assignments Analisar grandes conjuntos de dados para extrair insights relevantes; Desenvolver modelos preditivos, alinhados com as necessidades dos times de estratégia; Pesquisar e propor novas metodologias de modelagem compatíveis com o projeto; Acompanhar o ciclo de vida dos modelos, incluindo implantação emonitoramento; Trabalhar em parceria com a equipe de Engenharia de Dados e MLOps para melhor implementação dos modelos; Comunicar os resultados das análises aos diferentes parceiros, tanto técnicos quanto executivos. Oferecer de orientação técnica especializada para analistas e estagiários do time. Requirements And Qualifications Graduação em Estatística, Ciência da Computação, Matemática, Engenharia ou área relacionada. Experiência com análise exploratória de dados; Experiência com modelos preditivos: Modelos Lineares, Regressão logística, Random Forest, Boosting etc.; Experiência com modelos não supervisionados; Experiência em Python, Pyspark; Experiência com Databricks; Ampla experiência profissional atuando com produtos financeiros, bem como riscos de crédito; Habilidade para se comunicar em ambientes colaborativos e multidisciplinares; Participação ativa na elaboração da solução em parceria com o time de negócios, seguida da execução e acompanhamento do projeto pós implantação do modelo. Additional information Vale Alimentação e Refeição: Seu VR e VA são flexíveis, para que você atenda às suas necessidades e defina a melhor maneira de utilizá-los; Vale-Transporte: Para nos encontrarmos na Porto; Serviços de Transporte: Para o seu conforto e segurança no trajeto até o nosso escritório, disponibilizamos vans nas principais estações de acesso à Porto: Luz, Barra Funda, Santa Cecília e Júlio Prestes; Plano de Saúde, Odontológico e Seguro de Vida: Para que você possa se cuidar, e também cuidar de seus dependentes; Participação nos Lucros - PLR: Pois sabemos que só vamos crescer, se crescermos juntos; Porto em Ação: Programa complementar à PLR, disponibilizando anualmente, até 2025, uma porcentagem de valor do seu salário em ações da Porto; Pais, mães e filhos: Auxílio creche ou babá, para cuidar do seu bem mais precioso; Previdência Privada - PortoPrev: Para você garantir um futuro mais tranquilo; Gympass: Para você possa se exercitar e cuidar da sua saúde física em diversas academias, onde estiver; Bolsa de estudos; Para você começar uma graduação ou que sonha em fazer uma segunda faculdade ou pós-graduação. Cursos de Idiomas: Subsídio para cursos de Inglês e Espanhol; Programa Saúde Integral: Série de benefícios e iniciativas para te apoiar a encontrar equilíbrio de forma integral, através de três pilares: saúde mental, saúde física e saúde financeira; Desconto em Produtos e Serviços: Para que você possa desfrutar dos produtos e serviços deste nosso ecossistema gigante; Local de trabalho: Campos Elíseos - SP (Atuamos com modelos híbridos de trabalho que poderão ser explorados no processo seletivo) Na Porto, Você Importa! A Porto é muito mais que uma seguradora: é um ecossistema gigante que utiliza tecnologia para criar soluções, através de quatro verticais de negócio: Porto Bank, Porto Saúde, Porto Seguro e Porto Serviço . A reputação e o reconhecimento conquistados ao longo de mais de 7 décadas reforçam o tamanho da Porto, uma empresa referência em negócios, feita para e por pessoas. Aqui, bate no peito de 13 mil colaboradores o orgulho de fazer parte de uma organização sólida e ética , que transforma sonhos em realidades fantásticas para os nossos mais de 15,8 milhões de clientes. São mais de 101 sucursais e escritórios regionais em todo o Brasil. O aprendizado faz parte do nosso DNA, e aqui, você terá incentivos, ferramentas e gente boa para você aprender e crescer, a cada dia, um ambiente de acolhimento e segurança, onde cada um possa ser e se orgulhar de quem se é, promovendo um espaço de respeito e vivendo de forma integral e com bem-estar, em uma empresa genuinamente humana. DIVERSIDADE & INCLUSÃO NA PORTO Aqui na Porto, valorizamos a diversidade e acreditamos que um time plural é imprescindível para o desenvolvimento de todo o nosso negócio, da sociedade, e de cada pessoa, pois entendemos que cada indivíduo é único na construção de um ambiente mais inovador e inclusivo. Juntos, trabalhamos diariamente para construirmos um espaço seguro, livre e acolhedor, com mais pluralidade e respeito. Por isso, incentivamos fortemente a inscrição de mulheres, de pessoas negras, de pessoas com deficiência e de pessoas LGBTQIA+ em todas as nossas vagas.

jobs_description: Who are we? Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company®, operating over 250 data centers across the globe. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect foundational infrastructure at software speed. Equinix enables organizations to access all the right places, partners and possibilities to scale with agility, speed the launch of digital services, deliver world-class experiences and multiply their value, while supporting their sustainability goals. Joining our operations team means that you will be at the forefront of all we do, maintaining critical facilities infrastructure as part of a close-knit team delivering best-in-class service to our data center customers. We embrace diversity in thought and contribution and are committed to providing an equitable work environment that is foundational to our core values as a company and is vital to our success. Database Engineering Specialist Job Summary Embark on a distinguished career with the Engineering Tool Brazil team at Equinix, where your role will be instrumental in overseeing our Managed Service tools. This esteemed position is designed for a dynamic professional who excels in orchestrating cross-national team engagements focused on the standardization of infrastructure architecture projects, alongside providing comprehensive support for the ecosystem underpinning our tools. We are in pursuit of an individual with a profound analytical mindset and a forward-thinking approach, someone who is inherently driven by a passion for innovation and thrives in navigating through complex challenges. What You’ll Be Doing Provide N3-level support, including escalation and resolution of critical incidents and technical complexities. Perform capacity and performance analyses, pinpointing improvement areas and devising optimization strategies for infrastructure/database. Proactively monitor databases, ensuring high availability, and swiftly identifying and addressing issues. Engage in new project development to enhance and expand managed products, staying abreast of market trends and tools. Conduct preventive maintenance and manage product logical security, including security audits. Facilitate root cause analysis documentation following investigations of failures or problems. Participate in supplier meetings and technical events, contributing to a collaborative global architecture effort. What We’ll Expect From You A complete degree in the IT field. Profound knowledge in managing databases on physical/virtual servers, with a specific focus on MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, and additional experience with Oracle. Expertise in VMWare virtualization-based infrastructure and TCP/OSI network infrastructure. Advanced proficiency in Linux Operating Systems and monitoring platforms such as Zabbix and Grafana. Fluent in English (conversational level) with the ability to create automation scripts, preferably in Python. Demonstrated experience in infrastructure projects, database design, and API deployment. What Will Be a Differential If You Have ITIL V3/V4 Practitioner MySQL Database Administration Oracle Certified Specialist Red Hat Certified Architect (RHCA) AWS Certified Database - Specialty Why Equinix Equinix is an equal employment opportunity employer. jobs_description: ADP Ventures is hiring a Lead Data Scientist. Does the thought of working with one of the most comprehensive employment data sets in the US excite you? Are you inspired by transformation and making an impact on the lives of millions of people every day? Well, this may be the role for you. Ready to design what is next? The ADP Ventures is a new business incubator, maturing ideas into new businesses and startups that will help our clients navigate the world of work. You will be working on a cross-functional team located in Porto Alegre, Brazil but with peers at our New York City office. As a member of the ASTRA team, you'll find that innovation is at the heart of everything we do. Embedded within the Ventures team, our mission is to leverage artificial intelligence to pioneer new pathways and solutions across a diverse range of products. With a commitment to excellence and a forward-thinking mindset, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what is possible in AI, ensuring that we not only meet the needs of today but also anticipate and shape the future. Every day you will work on a global team with multiple stakeholders to identify, design, develop, and implement advanced analytics projects that assist our clients daily. You will work with your team to provide, interpret, and predict necessary metrics for decision-making. You will code with machine learning tools like Python, AWS, and ML (Machine Learning) techniques, to synthesize millions of data sets into patterns that answer ad hoc requests and generate valuable insights for our clients. Your work will focus on creating and refining state-of-the-art recommendation and conversation engines. Also, to research the latest developments in AI research and technology, actively incorporating new techniques and approaches to maintain our leadership in innovation. To thrive in this career, you should know how to identify errors and reactively fix them. You will need to have some formal education in quantitative analytics and know design patterns and data structures. You have the skills to leverage existing models or create new models using the technologies above. But given the scale of our data sets and the complex problems we give you to solve, you will stay challenged and engaged with years of exciting projects ahead—all while growing your skills and progressing in a rewarding career. Like what you see? Apply now! What You'll Do Learn more about ADP at tech.adp.com/careers Here is what you can expect on a typical day: Innovative Recommendation & Language Solutions. Your journey begins by leveraging your expertise in Recommendation Systems, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Conversation Engines, enriched by your solid background in Advanced Analytics & Predictive Modeling. You'll confront complex challenges through adept analytical questioning, data extraction and analysis from varied sources, leading to the distillation of crucial insights. Advanced Analytics & Predictive Modeling. From the outset, your ability to synthesize insights into compelling narratives, complemented by visual representations and actionable recommendations, will be instrumental in pioneering innovative solutions in recommendation and language technologies. This expertise not only sets the foundation for success but also positions you as a key player in driving forward-thinking outcomes —this will set you up for success on Day 1. Own and Manage Projects. You will identify, design, develop, and implement advanced analytical projects. Limitless Possibilities. You will continue learning and discovering new ways to leverage ADP data to create new products and services and find more insights. You are passionate about learning and applying new techniques within data science that lead to innovations. Collaboration and Communication. You will be part of a collaborative team, listening to needs, then finding and sharing solutions. You are comfortable and skilled at presenting to both peers and leadership on your projects and findings. Experience. With at least 8 years of hands-on experience in Recommendation Engines, NLP, and/or Conversation Systems, you bring a wealth of knowledge and a track record of impactful contributions in similar roles. Your experience acts as a cornerstone for innovative problem-solving and thought leadership within our team. To Succeed In This Role Bachelor's degree in computer science, Statistics, Engineering, or a related field; Strong experience in relevant skills gained and developed in the same or similar role; Advanced English skills (able to interact daily with a distributed team); Fluency in Python - including popular data science packages (pandas, sklearn, etc) and quality tests; Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms and methods used in the data science field; Experience with Machine Learning model development and deployment; Knowledge of Natural Language Processing and Conversation Engines; Experience with Recommendation systems; Knowledge with Cloud solutions (AWS, GCP, Azure); Interest in LLMs, Generative AI and Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG); Willing to work with ML Ops and Software Development activities as well. Bonus Points For These Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, or a related field, with a strong focus on AI and Machine Learning; Good understanding of Software Engineering; Exposure to Jupyter notebooks and/or Databricks platform; Experience with AWS cloud solutions (S3, Glue, Lambda, SageMaker); Experience with integrating data products (recommender systems, classifiers, chatbots, etc) into applications in production environments; Knowledge of Continuous Integration & Delivery methodologies; Experience with Vector Databases. You'll Love Working Here Because You Can Have courageous team collaboration. Courage comes from how associates are willing to have difficult conversations, speak up, be an owner, and challenge one another's ideas to find the best solution. Deliver at epic scale. We deliver real user outcomes using strong judgment and good instincts. We are obsessed with the art of achieving simplicity with a focus on client happiness and productivity. Be surrounded by curious learners. We align ourselves with other smart people in an environment where we grow and elevate one another to the next level. We encourage our associates to listen, stay agile, and learn from their mistakes. Act like an owner & doer. Mission-driven and committed to leading change, you will be encouraged to take on any challenge and solve complex problems. No tasks are beneath or too great for us. We are hands-on and willing to master our craft. Give back to others. Always do the right thing for our clients and our community and humbly give back to the community where we live and work. Support our associates in times of need through ADP's Philanthropic Foundation. Join a company committed to equality and equity. Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions. What are you waiting for? Apply today! Find out why people come to ADP and why they stay: https://youtu.be/ODb8lxBrxrY (ADA version: https://youtu.be/IQjUCA8SOoA ) Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP: ADP is committed to an inclusive, diverse and equitable workplace, and is further committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic including: race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, protected veteran status or disability. Hiring decisions are based upon ADP’s operating needs, and applicant merit including, but not limited to, qualifications, experience, ability, availability, cooperation, and job performance. Ethics at ADP: ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Click https://jobs.adp.com/life-at-adp/ to learn more about ADP’s culture and our full set of values.

titulo: Pessoa Engenheira para Data Center - Vaga Exclusiva para Pessoa com Deficiência , DCEO Technician
qtd_candidatos: Seja uma das primeiras pessoas a se candidatar
jobs_description: Description A Amazon Web Services (AWS) é uma empresa de tecnologia de ritmo acelerado e líder no mundo dos data centers. Nossas equipes dão suporte às operações de alguns dos data centers mais poderosos do mundo e mantém a operação de todos os sistemas de infraestrutura crítica para que estejamos bem preparados para enfrentar qualquer situação. A AWS tem o maior portfólio de computação em nuvem do mundo. Como parte da equipe, você trabalhará em alguns dos data centers mais sofisticados e seguros do planeta. Nossa equipe de operações nos ajuda a mantê-los assim, sempre buscando trabalhar com as mentes mais brilhantes para ajudar a testar e implementar as mais novas tecnologias e práticas de trabalho para atender às demandas de um mercado em constante mudança. Temos paixão por aprender e evoluir, é assim que ajudamos a nos definir como líderes no setor. Vamos trabalhar duro, nos divertir e fazer história! A Amazon Web Services Brasil valoriza a Diversidade, Equidade e Inclusão (DE&I) em todas as nossas posições de trabalho, e por isso atuamos com intencionalidade para que nosso ambiente interno reflita a pluralidade dos mercados em que atuamos e clientes que atendemos. No Brasil , estruturamos um Comitê de Diversidade, Equidade e Inclusão composto por representantes de áreas e cargos diferentes pois entendemos que essa agenda precisa de diferentes perspectivas e vivências múltiplas. Nossa liderança é engajada e entende cada dia mais o seu papel na disseminação e prática dos nossos príncipios de liderança, com objetivo de sermos “a melhor empresa para se trabalhar do mundo”. Sabemos da nossa responsabilidade e necessidade de mudança e somos conscientes de que “ Sucesso e crescimento trazem grandes responsabilidades”. Nossos grupos de afinidade são formados por pessoas voluntárias de diferentes unidades de negócio e são parte ativa na definição das estratégias de DE&I. Além disso, atuam como embaixadores dessa agenda e vão te apoiar desde o Day 1. Lembre-se “it´s always Day 1”. Os grupos estão organizados nas seguintes frentes: BEN - Black Employee Network, Women@Amazon, Glamazon (LGBTQIA+) e Pessoa com Deficiência. Se você quiser solicitar uma acomodação para a entrevista ou o processo de integração, avise seu recrutador (a) e ele(a) o conectará à nossa equipe de acomodação. Mentoria e Crescimento profissional Nossa equipe é dedicada a apoiar as pessoas recém contratadas. Temos uma equipe com ampla variedade de níveis de experiência e cargos, e estamos construindo um ambiente que celebra o compartilhamento de conhecimento e a mentoria. Nós nos preocupamos com o crescimento de sua carreira e nos esforçamos para atribuir projetos que contribuam para que cada pessoa da equipe se desenvolva e possa liderar iniciativas mais complexas no futuro. Key job responsibilities Ensino Médio Técnico em Elétrica/Mecânica ou Graduação em Engenharia Elétrica/Mecânica ou áreas correlatas. Experiência relevante com data centers ou em instalações de missão crítica (exemplo: hospital, instalação militar, instalação de segurança pública, etc.) A day in the life Esta posição lida com projetos de média complexidade. Também realiza instalações de rack, descomissionamento de rack, faz leituras operacionais e realiza atividades de instalações de infraestrutura. Fornece indicadores de desempenho para outros times, e também é responsável por acompanhar contratados, subcontratados e fornecedores no local, garantindo que todo o trabalho realizado esteja de acordo com as práticas, procedimentos e legislação local. Além disso, monitora o desempenho de todos os equipamentos elétricos, mecânicos e de segurança contra incêndio/vida dentro do data center. Certifica-se de que todos os procedimentos de segurança sejam cumpridos durante a execução do trabalho. Esta posição, tem ainda, um componente físico que exige que a pessoa possa levantar e transportar equipamentos até 18Kg. Pode ser necessário trabalhar em espaços apertados ou em locais elevados, respeitando as diretrizes de saúde e segurança. A operação do data center consiste de equipes que trabalham 24x7 em esquema de plantão. We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations: Barueri, SP, BRA Basic Qualifications Experiência com operações de Data Centers ou ambiente de missão crítica, o qual exige conhecimento específico na parte elétrica, mecânica e de sistemas de controle. Preferred Qualifications Conhecimento de competências chave na parte elétrica. Company - A100 ROW Servicos De Dados Brasil Ltda. Job ID: A2589470

jobs_description: Vem ser Inter com a gente!!! Conta digital gratuita, plataforma de investimentos, shopping e o que mais a vida precisar. O Inter é isso, e é muito mais. A gente acredita que tudo pode ser mais simples, e que cada dia é mais uma oportunidade de fazer diferente. Se você também é assim, vem ser #sanguelaranja. Join us in Inter&Co!!! Free digital account, investment platform, shopping and whatever else life needs. Inter is that, and much more. We believe that everything can be simpler, and that every day is another opportunity to do something different. If you're like this too, come be #sanguelaranja. O que você irá fazer? Realizar tarefas de data translator construindo visões analíticas de dados contextualizadas pelas necessidades das áreas de negócio por meio de uma interação contínua com stakeholders das diversas áreas de negócio do Inter. Por meio de um conhecimento aprofundado das regras de negócio da empresa e a arquitetura de sistemas transacionais, propor soluções produtizadas de fácil consumo por analistas, gestores e demais serviços analíticos associados para a composição de uma fonte única de conhecimento (SSOT). Constuir pipelines de ETL por meio de ferramentas de engenharia de dados que garantam eficiência e escalabilidade de soluções consumidoras de grandes volumes de dados, entregando visões analíticas para diversos níveis organizacionais da empresa. Propor soluções inteligentes de modelagens de dados, processamento de alta performance, monitoramento de data quality, gestão do conhecimento e governança de produtos de dados para a plataforma de dados da diretoria de crédito. Promover a descoberta de conhecimento em bases de dados, atuando em parceria com Cientistas de Dados na elaboração e construção de features relevantes para a construção de modelos de machine learning, políticas de concessão de crédito/recuperação e monitoramento pró-ativo de performance. Atuar juntamente com os Engenheiros de Machine Learning na construção e sustentação da Feature Store, contribuindo para o perfeito funcionamento dos modelos de machine learning das esteiras automatizadas de concessão e recuperação de crédito. Inovar e se manter atualizado com as principais tendências da área, conseguindo contribuir ativamente com novas técnicas, metodologias e pacotes que ajudem a avançar a área de ciência de dados. Manter comunicação constante com a área de negócios, garantindo a entrega de valor no melhor formato de consumo mantendo um canal aberto entre os stakeholders do projeto. O que buscamos? Formação: Educação superior completo - Ciências exatas, ciências sociais aplicadas ou áreas afins Desejável de 1 ano atuando com data analytics Dominio de linguagens de programação: SQL (obrigatório) e Python, Spark ou R Domínio de conceitos estatísticos para transformação de dados Domínio de técnicas de feature engineering Noções de ferramentas de pipeline de dados e data lake em ambiente cloud (preferencialmente AWS) Noções de Machine Learning e Técnicas de Embedding de dados não estruturados #VemproInter!!! O Nosso time de Talent é focado em contratar pessoas protagonistas, atuando com paixão e mentalidade inclusiva, respeitando a singularidade de cada pessoa e oferecendo a todos os colaboradores meios para que possam desenvolver o seu potencial e protagonismo. O Inter é parceiro e está por dentro de projetos inclusivos, todas as nossas vagas são direcionadas a pessoas com deficiências. #ComeToInter!! Our Talent team is focused on hiring leading people, acting with passion and an inclusive mindset, respecting the uniqueness of each person and offering all employees the means to develop their potential and protagonism. Inter is a partner and is aware of inclusive projects, all of our vacancies are aimed at people with disabilities.

jobs_description: Data Scientist for genAI Software Development We're looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our growing team and contribute to the development of data-driven software solutions. You'll leverage your expertise in data analysis and machine learning to identify opportunities, design solutions, and translate them into real-world applications. What Your New Challenge Will Look Like Partner with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements Develop and deploy machine learning models to solve complex business problems Be part of the development of a new solution powered by genAI technology (This may involve working with software engineers or coding yourself depending on the project) Continuously monitor and evaluate the performance of models and applications to ensure effectiveness Communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and advancements in data science and machine learning Why you belong at 4flow You have a good university degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science or a related field (or equivalent experience) First experience in data analysis, machine learning and genAI technologies ⁠You have practical experience in Python as well as basic knowledge of SQL or NoSQL ⁠You communicate confidently in English Ideally, first experience with agile software development framework Experience being part of software development projects Experience with additional programming languages like JavaScript Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) Experience with a specific domain relevant to our industry (please specify in your cover letter) What We Offer Come join us! 4flow offers a clearly defined vision, excellent job security, and outstanding opportunities for your individual development. As part of a highly international, fast-growing company with a vibrant corporate culture, you will enjoy a competitive base salary, an attractive bonus system, and a great benefits package. Ready for 4flow? Then please apply online. Please upload an English version of your resume when applying.

jobs_description: About The Team Grocery is Uber's newest and fast growing business line, delighting customers with next-hour delivery of household essentials from their favorite local stores. The Grocery Fulfillment team is focused on building best-in-class products and technology to support consumers and shoppers in fulfilling grocery orders. The Grocery Fulfillment team is looking for a strong engineering leader to execute on the team's ambitious and fast-paced product strategy. This is a very important and visible role with a potential for significant impact on the fast growing grocery business. The EM will lead a product focused team in close collaboration with product and data science leads to build shopping tools that power the grocery business. For an engineering manager with strong execution muscle, technical depth and product sense, this will be an excellent opportunity to learn, succeed and grow at Uber. About The Role As an Engineering Manager at Uber, you will be leading a group of engineers working with product managers, data scientists and other engineering teams to build solutions globally. We are looking for an Engineering Manager for the Uber Grocery team who will be responsible to build, mentor and manage a strong and high-impact team to offer an oustant and instant delivery for our partners! What You'll Do Directly own an engineering team passionate about learning and iterating with velocity. Challenge engineers to design innovative, highly-scalable, and robust systems. Build trust and foster a collaborative team culture. Build a strong brand and be able to attract and retain talent. Strategize and influence the product vision and roadmap in collaboration with the product and business team. Mentor other engineers and build a strong culture of quality, handle conflicts well and help build consensus. What You'll Need Bachelor's degree or higher in an engineering field (e.g. Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology etc.). A strong ability to architect and design robust, high-scale systems and to challenge engineers to think bigger and more generically in developing their solutions. Experience working with multi-functional, globally distributed teams to coordinate work and deliver solutions that span multiple teams. Collaboration with PMs, designers, data scientists and infrastructure teams to identify, prioritize and solve problems. Working actively on career mentor & development, handle performance & conflicts, influence cross-functional teams. Track record of managing, recruiting, and retaining strong engineering talent and growing effective teams. Desire knowledge about large-scale, distributed systems, including SQL/NoSQL storage, transactional updates, asynchronous processing with message queues like Kafka, logging, system monitoring, and performance tuning.

jobs_description: Job Description Atualmente a nossa Cultura passa por um processo de transformação e evolução. A nossa história e o nosso jeito de ser são marcados por sonhos grandes que nos trouxeram até aqui e que nos enchem de orgulho! Mas acreditamos que o momento de evoluir é sempre o agora e poder fazer isso junto com a nossa gente é o que torna nossa jornada ainda mais incrível. Nossa cultura honra o passado e hoje também é norteada por 3 principais valores que nos guiam para sermos uma cia cada vez mais inclusiva, diversa, colaborativa, tecnológica e conectada ao futuro do mundo e da nossa plataforma de negócios, são eles: Escuta Ativa, Colaboração e Visão de Longo Prazo, cada um abarcando outras competências que fazem parte do nosso jeito de ser. Nos orgulhamos da nossa capacidade de realização e paixão que nos trouxeram até aqui e para continuarmos a evoluir juntos te convidamos a fazer parte também dessa jornada. Prazer, somos a Ambev e adoraríamos te ter com a gente. Vamos juntos?! Responsibilities and assignments Atuação de forma integrada com diferentes setores da empresa, com o objetivo de identificar novas oportunidades de negócio. Realização de análises exploratórias de dados e estruturação de estudos de viabilidade Desenvolvimento de estratégias de investimento, avaliando o retorno dos projetos. Utilização de conhecimento de avaliação atuarial, modelagem estatística e mineração de dados para analisar as oportunidades não mapeadas. Estruturar problemas de negócio ambíguos em soluções data-driven Estudos estatísticos como análise de séries temporais, clustering, testes estatísticos clássicos, regressão linear. Correlacionar dados e tirar aprendizados não óbvios Requirements And Qualifications Graduação em: Estatística, Matemática, Engenharia, Ciências Atuariais ou áreas correlatas; 2/3 anos de experiência de mercado nessa área; Modelos estatísticos e preditivos: regressão, séries temporais e projeções; Conhecimento de econometria; Linguagem R, Python, SQL Inglês intermediário. Diferenciais Excel Avançado Power BI Gestão de Projetos Mini tab Access Additional information Benefícios: - Plano Odontológico; - Plano de Saúde; - Venda de Produtos para funcionários (as); - Auxílio Refeição / Alimentação ou refeitório no local dependendo da unidade; - Cesta de Natal + brinquedo para quem tem filhos(as); - Gympass; - Previdência privada; - Zenklub; - Gente 360. Seja bem-vindo à Ambev ENTRE PARA UM TIME QUE SONHA TÃO GRANDE COMO VOCÊ! Somos milhares de apaixonados e apaixonadas pelo que fazemos. Temos um orgulho imenso do nosso poder de impacto positivo e reconhecemos que, agindo como donos e donas, cada um de nós desempenha um papel fundamental no sucesso do nosso ecossistema. Somado a isso, todas nossas grandes conquistas tem o sabor da colaboração! Nosso sucesso é compartilhado e acreditamos que por meio da colaboração podemos encantar ainda mais o nossos clientes com as marcas que eles amam hoje, ao mesmo tempo em que podemos atender aos gostos de amanhã. 🍻 A Nossa Cultura é focada em construir um ambiente inclusivo e colaborativo, onde as pessoas possam ser o melhor delas mesmas - e nos ajudar a ser a nossa melhor versão! Procuramos gente com paixão, curiosidade e coragem para fazer a diferença aqui. Acolhemos talentos diversos, porque acreditamos que grandes ideias vêm de pessoas com diferentes trajetórias. Oferecemos oportunidades para talentos que estão ingressando no mercado de trabalho e somos apaixonados por impulsionar a nossa gente. É trabalhando e crescendo juntos que atingimos o nosso propósito: Sonhamos Grande por um Futuro com Mais Razões para Brindar!

jobs_description: Job Description Data and Documentation Control Administrators At Nextracker, we are leading in the energy transition, providing the most comprehensive portfolio of intelligent solar tracker and control software solutions for solar power plants, as well as strategic services to capture the full value of solar power plants for our customers. Our talented worldwide teams are transforming PV plant performance every day with smart technology, data monitoring and analysis services. As a company driving the clean energy transition, sustainability is not just a word. It's a core part of our business and our operations. Our sustainability efforts are based on five cornerstones: People, Community, Environment, Innovation, and Integrity. We are creative, collaborative and passionate problem-solvers from diverse backgrounds, driven by our shared mission to provide smart solar and software solutions for our customers and to mitigate climate change for future generations. Make your mark with Nextracker. Job Description: Manage data integrity, security and access in our PLM system including issuing item numbers for product/documentation, item creation, change requests, change orders creation, reporting, attribute maintenance, active item list and end of life maintenance, integration and data extracts, supporting automation initiatives and support data integrity into downstream tools. We Are Looking For Someone Who Demonstrates Intense collaboration Passionate customer focus Thoughtful, fast, disciplined execution Tenacious commitment to continuous improvement Relentless drive to win Duties Include And Not Limited To Data integrity and security, and accurate maintenance of product lifecycle data in our Engineering and management tools. Accurate item record creation including consistent naming convention, data fields selections, change order creation including consistent summary and description, linking relevant processes to the items or changes. Data entry into database, including creation of requests and change orders per company approval and tracking process. Also includes tasks such as reports, testing and subsequent write ups, and mass database updates via CSV upload Special projects such as problem solving and improving processes. Experienced with Product Lifecycle Management systems, bonus if experienced with tools such as Arena, NetSuite, Salesforce Minimum 2 years of database maintenance experience, or equivalent university program experience may be considered. titulo: PESSOA ANALISTA DE ARQUITETURA TI SR - FOCO EM SALESFORCE
jobs_description: Vaga disponível no modelo híbrido, para os locais abaixo: Barueri, SP, Brasil OSASCO, SP, Brasil RECIFE, PE, Brasil Curitiba, PR, Brasil Sobre o Bradesco Pensamos em estratégias que sejam capazes de criar oportunidades para a realização das pessoas e para o desenvolvimento sustentável de empresas e sociedade. Ao longo de oito décadas, com pioneirismo e inovação, contribuímos com a democratização do acesso aos serviços bancários no Brasil e fomos além, nos tornamos um dos maiores grupos financeiros da América Latina. Sobre a oportunidade O Departamento de Arquitetura tem a responsabilidade de direcionar as soluções técnicas que atendam as estratégias organizacionais e requisitos de negócio, usando como base padrões de mercado, princípios de arquitetura e arquiteturas de referência definidas. Como arquiteto(a), será responsável por construir os desenhos de solução envolvendo ambientes complexos e críticos, garantir aderência aos padrões arquiteturais estabelecidos, o melhor uso das tecnologias envolvidas e promover a inovação. Suas atividades com a gente envolvem: Domínio em estilos arquiteturais, padrões de projeto, padrões de integração, soluções baseadas em nuvens públicas/privadas e on-premises. Proposição de desenhos de soluções, com: Arquitetura de aplicação, de integração, de dados e técnica: - Captura e tradução de requisitos funcionais em técnicos; - Definição de arquiteturas de componentes, front-end modernos, integração e APIs, micro serviços, dados; - Projetos de modernização e jornadas para a nuvem; - Conhecimento no uso de soluções cloud baseados nos modelos SaaS, PaaS e IaaS; - Trabalhar com ao menos um dos principais provedores de nuvem (AZURE, AWS, GCP). Para essa oportunidade você precisa: - Java, NodeJS, SpringBoot - Kafka, RabbitMQ - Mongo, Cassandra, SQL, Redis, Postgree, DB2 - Containers, Kubernets - Metodologias Ágeis - Conceito FinOps - Conhecimento em GitOps - Conhecimento em Salesforce - Arquitetura Corporativa: Arquitetura de Negócio, Arquitetura de Aplicação, Arquitetura de Dados/Informações, Arquitetura de Infraestrutura e Segurança. - Experiência na função de arquiteto - Vivência em Cloud e Integração de sistemas Diferencial: - Atuação em migração de on-premises para cloud - Contexto de negócio Bancário. O que nós oferecemos: Remuneração -> Aderente às melhores práticas de mercado PLR (Participação nos Lucros e Resultados) -> Aderente às melhores práticas de mercado* Saúde -> Plano de saúde, odontológico e seguro de vida, além de descontos em farmácias. Auxílios -> Refeição, alimentação e transporte. Previdência –> Plano opcional e exclusivo para funcionários, com participação financeira da Organização Bradesco. Bem-estar -> O programa interno Viva Bem Bradesco conta com diversas iniciativas para prevenção de doenças e promoção de hábitos, atitudes e comportamentos saudáveis, além de oferecer orientação e aconselhamento para resolução de problemas pessoais, familiares, legais e financeiros. Capacitação -> Por meio da Universidade Corporativa Bradesco, a Unibrad, investimos no aprendizado pessoal e profissional do nosso time, promovendo soluções de aprendizagem e parcerias com instituições de ensino. Isenção de tarifas –> Cesta de serviços bancários exclusiva, com descontos e condições especiais em diversos produtos e serviços da Organização Bradesco. Mães, Pais e Filhos -> Auxílio creche/babá, licença paternidade e licença maternidade estendida, além de acompanhamento assistencial da gestação até o pós-parto.

jobs_description: ADP is hiring a Data Scientist. Does the thought of working with one of the most comprehensive employment data sets excite you? Are you inspired by transformation and making an impact on the lives of millions of people every day? Well, this may be the role for you. Ready to design what's next? In this role, you'll acquire, clean, and analyze large data sets and do exploratory analysis to understand our data and if it meets project requirements. It's more than digits and dials - you're making huge decisions that impact millions of customers. Every day you'll work with multiple stakeholders to identify, design, develop and implement advanced analytics projects that track the consumer conversion funnel from start to end. You'll work with your team to provide, interpret, and predict necessary metrics for decision-making. You'll train state-of-the-art deep learning models on quite exciting databases using tools like Python and AWS. To thrive in this career, you should know how to identify errors and reactively fix them. You'll need to have some formal education in quantitative analytics and know design patterns and data structures. You have the skills to leverage existing models or create new models using the technologies above. But given the scale of our data sets and the complex problems we give you to solve, you will stay challenged and engaged with years of exciting projects ahead--all while growing your skills and progressing in a rewarding career. Like what you see? Apply now! Learn More About ADP At Tech.adp.com/careers A little about ADP: We are a global leader in HR technology, offering the latest AI and machine learning-enhanced payroll, tax, HR, benefits, and much more. We believe our people make all the difference in cultivating an inclusive, down-to-earth culture that welcomes ideas, encourages innovation, and values belonging. ADP has a deep commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion as a global Best Places to Work, DiversityInc® Top 50 Company, Best CEO and company for women, LGBTQ+, multicultural talent, and more. Learn more about ADP's commitment on our YouTube channel: http://adp.careers/DEI_Videos What You'll Do Here's what you can expect on a typical day: Advanced Analytics & Predictive Modeling. You bring prior experience to the role of formulating analytical problems, extracting & analyzing data from multiple systems, summarizing critical findings/insights, and developing a compelling visual representation of analyses with actionable recommendations--this will set you up for success on Day 1. Own and Manage Projects. You will identify, design, develop, and implement advanced analytical projects. Limitless Possibilities. You will continue learning and discovering new ways to leverage ADP data to create new products and services and find more insights. You are passionate about learning and applying new techniques within data science that leads to innovations. Collaboration and Communication. You'll be part of a collaborative team, listening to needs, then finding and sharing solutions. You're comfortable and skilled at presenting to both peers and leadership on your projects and findings. To Succeed In This Role You have 2-5 years of experience in relevant skills gained and developed in the same or similar role. You'll have a Bachelor's degree OR equivalent. Prior experience with Machine Learning, Python, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning, AWS; data integration tools like Databricks will give you extra comfort in this role to be successful. You'll Love Working Here Because You Can Have courageous team collaboration. Courage comes from how associates are willing to have difficult conversations, speak up, be an owner, and challenge one another's ideas to find the best solution. Deliver at epic scale. We deliver real user outcomes using strong judgment and good instincts. We're obsessed with the art of achieving simplicity with a focus on client happiness and productivity. Be surrounded by curious learners. We align ourselves with other smart people in an environment where we grow and elevate one another to the next level. We encourage our associates to listen, stay agile, and learn from mistakes. Act like an owner & doer. Mission-driven and committed to leading change, you will be encouraged to take on any challenge and solve complex problems. No tasks are beneath or too great for us. We are hands-on and willing to master our craft. Give back to others. Always do the right thing for our clients and our community and humbly give back to the community where we live and work. Support our associates in times of need through ADP's Philanthropic Foundation. Join a company committed to equality and equity. Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions. What are you waiting for? Apply today! Find out why people come to ADP and why they stay: https://youtu.be/ODb8lxBrxrY (ADA version: https://youtu.be/IQjUCA8SOoA) Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP: ADP is committed to an inclusive, diverse and equitable workplace, and is further committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic including: race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, protected veteran status or disability. Hiring decisions are based upon ADP’s operating needs, and applicant merit including, but not limited to, qualifications, experience, ability, availability, cooperation, and job performance. Ethics at ADP: ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Click https://jobs.adp.com/life-at-adp/ to learn more about ADP’s culture and our full set of values.

jobs_description: Who We Are Is What We Do. Deel and our family of growing companies are made up of global teams dedicated to helping businesses hire anyone, anywhere, easily. Our market-leading technology, expertise, and global team are crucial to the platform’s success. We deliver the best products and features in our space, enabling millions of jobs worldwide and connecting the global workforce with the best companies and opportunities. Why should you be part of our success story? A 30-mile hiring radius should no longer dictate how companies hire because exceptional talent lives everywhere. Deel sees a world without hiring borders and endless talent that pairs perfect candidates with great companies. We offer global teams all the tools they need to hire, onboard, manage, pay, and scale at full speed. We aim to foster a diverse global economy by building a generational platform that seamlessly connects companies with talent worldwide. After our successful Series D in 2021, we raised another $50M in 2023, doubling our valuation to $12B. There’s never been a more exciting time to join Deel — the international payroll and compliance market leader. Rotinas: Análise de Dados: Realizar análises estatísticas avançadas para identificar padrões, tendências e insights relevantes nos conjuntos de dados. Conhecimento em frameworks de machine learning. Habilidades de comunicação e trabalho em equipe.
