jobs_description: DESCRIÇÃO DA VAGA O departamento de Dados está em busca de um Pleno com forte experiência em Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) para fazer parte do time de Data Reliability Engineering (DRE). DRE é responsável pelo mantimento de toda a plataforma de dados da ClearSale. O time lida com problemas de sistemas que trabalham com grandes quantidades de dados, assim como problemas nos próprios dados, como eventuais inconsistências. Hoje nós temos nossa plataforma de transferência de dados construída in-house, trabalhamos em todas as principais núvens (GCP, AWS e Azure) e com as mais novas tecnologias do mercado, como Kubernetes, Databricks, Spark, Lakehouse etc. RESPONSABILIDADES E ATRIBUIÇÕES Atividades: Participação ativa na estruturação e amadurecimento do time; Trazer inovações na maneira de se trabalhar com alertas e incidentes; Resolver incidentes, eliminar falsos positivos, calibrar alertas e inconsistências de dados; ; Proativamente contribuir para a criação de dashboards e alertas, a fim de garantir que toda a plataforma de dados está coberta; Ser capaz de não apenas resolver problemas, mas também identificar a causa raiz e garantir que não sejamos afetados novamente pelo mesmo problema sem sermos notificados; Aprimoramentos e uso completo do OpsGenie e Zendesk. REQUISITOS E QUALIFICAÇÕES Vem com a gente se você é uma pessoa que: Tem experiência com OpsGenie Já trabalhou lidando com alertas e incidentes de maneira estruturada, com chamados, plantonistas, post-mortem e fluxos bem definidos. Tem forte postura autodidata e com alta capacidade analítica para entender problemas através de gráficos, logs e métricas; É apaixonada por resolver problemas e é muito cuidadoso e detalhista em relação ao ambiente; Tem experiência na construção de soluções preventivas, inovadoras e/ou disruptivas; Procuramos uma pessoa que é crítica e ativamente presente em discussões, a fim de sempre contribuir nas demandas do dia a dia, com ideias relevantes. O que você precisa para participar do processo seletivo: Sólida experiência com OpsGenie e resolução de incidentes; Sabe fazer dashboards e alertas usando Grafana; Consegue fazer consultas SQL e KQL. INFORMAÇÕES ADICIONAIS Benefícios Oferecidos: PLR (Participação nos Lucros e Resultados); Vale Refeição ou Vale Alimentação; Auxílio Creche para crianças até 4 anos e 11 meses; Seguro de Vida; Gympass; Sesc; Cartão Multibenefícios Alelo – (com desconto na compra de diversos itens na rede credenciada, incluindo medicamentos em diversas redes de farmácias); Assistência Médica e Odontológica Bradesco. Benefícios adicionais com atividades disponíveis na Clearsale: Aulas de teatro; Política Educacional para Graduação e Pós Graduação; Programa eu Saudável (Acompanhamento de saúde e bem estar); Programa Primeiros Laços (Acompanhamento Gestacional); Licenças Maternidade e Paternidade estendida; Palestras de desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional. ETAPAS DO PROCESSO Etapa 1: Cadastro 1 Cadastro Etapa 2: Triagem 2 Triagem Etapa 3: Bate Papo com Talent 3 Bate Papo com Talent Etapa 4: Fit Analítico 4 Fit Analítico Etapa 5: Bate Papo com Liderança 5 Bate Papo com Liderança Etapa 6: Carta Proposta 6 Carta Proposta Etapa 7: Contratação 7 Contratação SOBRE A CLEARSALE_ A ClearSale (CLSA3) é referência em inteligência de dados com múltiplas soluções para prevenção a riscos em diferentes mercados, como e-commerce, mercado financeiro, vendas diretas, telecomunicações, entre outros. Nós somos a empresa que mais conhece o comportamento do consumidor digital brasileiro, o que faz com que impulsionemos negócios em todo o ecossistema da economia digital. Com o nosso time de especialistas, geramos um efeito de rede de proteção no mercado digital, identificando padrões de ataques, protegendo os mais variados segmentos de negócio e promovendo impacto positivo, para garantir a melhor experiência ao usuário, com mínima fricção, do onboarding ao transacional. Se assim como a gente, você quer tornar a vida digital de todos mais simples, segura e justa, vem ser ClearLover!

jobs_description: Sumário Liderará iniciativas que integram análise de dados epidemiológicos, com um forte foco na aplicação de IA para suporte ao diagnóstico em contexto de saúde pública, baseando-se nos dados abertos do SUS e coletados a partir dos estudos de validação clínica de soluções de IA em mundo real. Responsabilidades Realizar análises avançadas de dados epidemiológicos, com ênfase nos dados abertos do SUS, fazendo interface com a equipe multidisciplinar de ciência de dados, de forma a apoiar o desenvolvimento e validação de modelos de predição e diagnóstico baseados em modelos estatísticos e de Inteligência Artificial (IA). Contribuir ativamente para a produção científica, bem como no desenvolvimento, junto à equipe de pesquisa clínica, de protocolos de ensaio clínico e estudos prospectivos para a validação clínica de algoritmos de IA, visando o suporte à decisão diagnóstica. Avaliar e endereçar desafios técnicos e metodológicos intrínsecos à aplicação de IA em saúde, promovendo soluções que assegurem a causalidade e a efetividade comparativa das intervenções. Participar de reuniões de análise de dados (Analytics), fornecendo perspectivas epidemiológicas cruciais para o desenvolvimento e aprimoramento dos modelos de IA. Engajar-se na análise crítica das implicações éticas e de equidade dos modelos de IA, aplicando princípios epidemiológicos para assegurar a justiça algorítmica e a representatividade dos dados. Orientar e capacitar outros membros da equipe em técnicas avançadas de análise de dados e princípios de IA aplicados à saúde pública. Manter-se atualizado com as tendências atuais e futuras em epidemiologia e IA, participando de fóruns científicos e colaborações interdisciplinares. Análise lógica de dados epidemiológicos complexos. Requisitos Graduação em Saúde Pública, Epidemiologia ou áreas relacionadas. Conhecimento em epidemiologia e saúde pública. Capacidade para contribuir para o desenvolvimento científico e análises críticas relacionadas à aplicação de IA em saúde, com foco em causas, predições e análise de equidade. Fluência em inglês para engajamento com a comunidade científica internacional e revisão de literatura. Pós-graduação ou experiência significativa nas áreas de saúde pública, epidemiologia ou em áreas correlatas. Experiência em Ciência de Dados/Inteligência Artificial será um diferencial. Desejável: Experiência prática com 'big data' e dados abertos do SUS, e habilidade para aplicar métodos de IA para análise e interpretação desses dados. Sobre a vaga Unidade Faria Lima Carga horária: 220h/mês Modelo de trabalho: hibrido Einstein Benefícios – Compartilhando Bem Estar Cuidados com a saúde: Programa Cuidar com serviços realizados no Einstein para promover a saúde e bem estar dos colaboradores e dependentes, Clínicas Einstein, Telemedicina, Convênio Farmácia, Convênio Médico, Assistência Odontológica e Consultório Dental in Company. Bem estar: Gympass, Coral, Programa de Orientação Pessoal e SESC. Para você e sua família: Licença paternidade estendida, Seguro de Vida, Creche ou Auxílio Creche para mães ou pais com guarda legal, Auxílio para Filhos com Deficiência e Previdência Privada com taxa zero. Alimentação: Vale Alimentação, Vale Refeição ou Refeitório no local de trabalho. Mobilidade: Vale Transporte, Fretado, Estacionamento e Circular Metrô. Clube de Benefícios: Para economizar e obter vantagens nas compras de produtos e serviços de diversas categorias, como Beleza e Fitness, Comer e Beber, Compras, Cultura e Lazer, Educação Ensino Einstein, Turismo e muito mais. Programa Mais Conectados: Trabalho remoto nas modalidades Teletrabalho ou Híbrido conforme atividade e área de atuação. Os benefícios podem sofrer alteração de acordo com a convenção coletiva, unidade de trabalho e políticas vigentes.

jobs_description: Esta vaga foi obtida de um site de empregos. Saiba mais

Esta é uma vaga de um cliente da GeekHunter, candidate-se para ter acesso às informações completas sobre a empresa. Responsabilidades Análise de Requisitos: Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com as equipes internas para compreender os requisitos de análise de dados e transformá-los em especificações para visualizações. Aquisição e Limpeza de Dados: Coletar, limpar e preparar os dados necessários para a visualização, garantindo sua integridade e qualidade. Desenvolvimento de Visualizações: Utilizar ferramentas como Tableau, Power BI, ou outras ferramentas de visualização para criar dashboards e relatórios interativos que apresentem dados de forma clara e perspicaz. Análise Interpretativa: Interpretar dados e identificar tendências, padrões e insights relevantes para apoiar a tomada de decisões informadas pela empresa. Colaboração Interfuncional: Trabalhar em conjunto com equipes técnicas e não técnicas para comunicar efetivamente resultados e insights por meio de visualizações de dados compreensíveis. Otimização Contínua: Identificar oportunidades para melhorar a eficiência e a eficácia das visualizações de dados, bem como propor e implementar soluções inovadoras. Requisitos Olá, somos a Randstad, líder global em soluções de Recursos Humanos. Combinamos nossa paixão por pessoas e tecnologia e, assim, apoiamos processos de recrutamento e seleção no mundo todo. Ajudamos as empresas e candidatos a seguir adiante. Fundada na Holanda, em 1960, com mais de 5.000 escritórios e mais de 40.000 colaboradores, em 39 países. Em 2022, ajudamos mais de 2 millhões de pessoas a encontrar um emprego e aconselhamos mais de 230.000 clientes na contratação dos talentos certos. Estamos com oportunidades de Analista de Visualização de Dados em níveis Pleno, Sênior e Especialista para atuar em uma organização global com presença em 115 países, mais de dois milhões de empresas usuárias e 6 bilhões de transações todos os dias - ajudam a garantir uma linguagem comum de negócios em todo o mundo. É uma oportunidade para um dos nossos clientes, grande multinacional americana com atuação em projetos globais de TI e procuramos profissionais com as seguintes qualificações: Bacharelado em Estatística, Ciência da Computação, Matemática, Engenharia de Dados ou área relacionada. Mestrado é uma vantagem. Experiência comprovada em análise de dados e visualização. Proficiência em ferramentas de visualização de dados, como Tableau, Power BI, QlikView e Qlik Sense, Google Data Studio ou outras ferramentas similares. Conhecimento sólido de linguagens de programação, como SQL, Python ou R. Habilidades analíticas e capacidade de transformar dados em insights acionáveis. Habilidades Obrigatórias Tableau Power BI Habilidades Desejáveis Python SQL Qlikview A vaga aceita trabalho remoto? Sim

jobs_description: Job Title: My SQL Engineer Location: Hybrid (San Jose Campus Office- 2 days a week) This role ensures operational excellence by maintaining a stable, secure, compliant, and highly available database platform. Provide guidance to engineering team and 24x7 Level-3 Technical support. This includes creation of user stories/requirements, iterative design and POC/experimentation, automation coding, and comprehensive & automated testing · Complement a high-performance team with your outstanding talents for innovative cloud solutions, while designing and implementing database solutions in AWS, Azure, and traditional IaaS platforms. · Provide input to long-term service vision and technology/service strategies and roadmaps. jobs_description: Uma empresa mineira de engenharia e soluções integradas, presente nos mercados nacional e internacional, com uma trajetória marcada pela competência de seus talentos humanos e pelo forte investimento em tecnologias de ponta, permitindo estar entre as pioneiras no desenvolvimento e implantação de soluções inteligentes. A TSA é uma empresa que gera e compartilha conhecimento, apostando na construção de uma sociedade mais ética e responsável. Com sede em Belo Horizonte/MG, a empresa conta com uma equipe de profissionais altamente qualificados para atender às demandas de mercado. Se identificou? Faça seu cadastro e venha fazer parte do nosso time! Responsabilidades e atribuições Como Analista de Sistemas você vai: Desenvolver projetos de pesquisa tecnológica. Especificar, desenvolver e implantar sistemas da área de tecnologia de informação industriais (MES, LIMS, portais de informação, sistemas industriais). Realizar serviços de suporte técnico aos usuários. Modelar e configurar banco de dados; desenvolver interfaces para sistemas de informação. Desenvolver e conduzir treinamento para clientes e colaboradores. Infra Estrutura (Area de PIMS): Desenvolver projetos de pesquisa tecnológica, Implantar sistemas de informação industriais (MES, LIMS, PIMS, plant-to-business systems integration, mobile solutions) configurar coleta de dados. Realizar a integração dos mesmos sistemas corporativos das empresas clientes (ex ERP), permitindo o compartilhamento de dados relevantes da operação dos processos e contribuindo para uma maior agilidade e confiabilidade na geração das informações que suportam as decisões dentro da empresa. Desenvolver aplicações nas ferramentas PIMS e demais tecnologias, além do trabalho de ciências de dados. Requisitos e qualificações Formação necessária: Superior em Engenharia ou Sistema de Informação ou Ciências da Computação ou Tecnologia da Informação e cursos afins Conhecimentos desejáveis: Desenvolvimento: Sólidos conhecimentos de lógica de programação; Conhecimentos de metodologias diversas como: modelagem de dados, análise essencial, análise estruturada, orientação de objeto; Conhecimento em arquitetura de software; Inglês nível intermediário. Infra Estrutura (Área de PIMS): Conhecimentos em administração em banco de dados; Conhecimento de OPC Sólidos conhecimentos em implantação e operação de sistemas industriais; Sólidos conhecimentos em implantação de Sistema Operacional para Servidores (Windows, Linux); Conhecimentos em redes; Conhecimento de Ciências de Dados; Desejável conhecimento de Pims; Desejável certificação da OSI PIMS (pleno e sênior); Inglês nível intermediário; Espanhol nível intermediário. Habilidade e conhecimento de sistema operacional Linux HeadRat Enterprise. Conhecimento em segurança de ambientes de servidores em rede. Apoiar projetos na validação dos requisitos das aplicações de terceiros considerando as melhores práticas de cybersecurity, arquitetura, infraestrutura de hosting. Atuar no acompanhamento das etapas de planejamento, arquitetura, engenharia, montagem e comissionamento de infraestruturas de servidores on-premise. Conhecimento em ambientes virtualizados e cloud computing. jobs_description: About Voxy Voxy, founded in 2010, is a trailblazing language training platform tailored to meet the specific language needs of international organizations. With a mission to enhance productivity, foster collaboration, and unleash human potential, Voxy has established itself as a global leader in the field of corporate language education. With a robust foundation and an ever-evolving vision, Voxy has supported corporate clients across 150 countries by delivering live language coaching led by certified instructors and an expansive library of role-specific courses that bridge critical soft and technical skill gaps. Today, Voxy's impact spans the globe, with dedicated teams operating across multiple regions, including the United States, Brazil, Chile, Mexico, Thailand, Malaysia, Spain, Italy, and Ireland. Originally focused on providing English language instruction, Voxy has evolved to offer an array of languages, including Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, German, and French, catering to a diverse range of learners. We believe that learning a language should be fun, rewarding, and a gateway to the best experiences life has to offer. If you agree, we’d love to talk. You can see more details about our values here ( https://voxy.com/about/careers/ ) What You’ll Be Doing Compiling all necessary information for student enrollment via Google Forms, ensuring seamless processes for subscription and cancellations Creating lists using Excel and Google Sheets for learner registration management based on specific criteria such as spoken language and payment status, utilizing marketing and communications tools Monitoring payments and subscriptions confirmations via a financial tool Assisting in verifying learner account activations Providing support by addressing inquiries and double-checking information as needed Work closely with the Customer Success Department to support with new projects and more operational tasks What We’re Looking For: Strong proficiency in Excel for data management and analysis. Exceptional attention to detail and precision in executing tasks. Excellent organizational skills to manage multiple operational processes efficiently. Proficiency in utilizing ChatGPT for automation and support. Advanced English proficiency Ability to perform analysis for improved operational strategies. In addition to a rewarding job that that will directly impact how millions of students learn English, working here, you’ll enjoy: Competitive internship grant Great benefits: medical insurance, cell phone & wifi reimbursement, home office budget, team events Remote-friendly work policies HONE Membership - live training platform with programs designed for leaders, managers and individual contributors(ICs) to develop skills to succeed in the workplace Language classes w/ Voxy & Fluentify Work with an awesome international team of super bright, creative, talented, and passionate individuals based around the world (We operate in nine countries!) We believe in a workplace that is meant for everyone. Voxy is an equal opportunity employer. Voxy believes that a creative, engaged and diverse team can transform the market and positively impact people's lives through education. We are sure that the mission of building the most effective way to learn English is done with a plurality of ideas and points of view, which is why we work to promote Diversity, Equity and Inclusion initiatives in our company. In addition to training, benchmarking, and community partnerships, we also work in alignment with our internal DEI Committee. As a reflection of our beliefs around inclusion in the workplace, our selection process has no restrictions; our goal is to assemble a diverse team that will help us be leaders in our market. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status. Learn more about our DEI initiatives and ERGs by clicking here .

jobs_description: A Pix Force foi fundada em 2015 e, de lá pra cá, desenvolve soluções utilizando tecnologias de visão computacional , inteligência artificial e machine learning . Nossos projetos e soluções transformam dados e imagens em informações valiosas para os clientes através da interpretação automática de imagens e vídeos. O nosso time de Pix Whizz é formado de profissionais especializados em diversas áreas de conhecimento. A palavra-chave para trabalhar conosco é INOVAÇÃO . Se você se considera um profissional inovador, então você tem tudo para se tornar parte da nossa equipe. O Jeito Pix De Ser Quando um Pix Whizz pede ajuda, fazemos o possível para colaborar; Sempre falamos quando algo não está bom e sugerimos melhorias; Somos inovadores nos projetos, nas ideias e nos processos. Não deixamos de fazer por medo de errar; Estamos em constante desenvolvimento e evolução, respeitamos as diferenças e o tempo de cada um; Somos protagonistas da história da Pix, juntos seremos os melhores do mundo! Atividades Utilização de softwares da área de geoprocessamento/sensoriamento remoto (Qgis, Arcgis, Envi, entre outros); Elaboração de documentação técnica (relatórios, apresentações, entre outros); Definições de metodologias baseadas em sensoriamento remoto para a produção de soluções automáticas de análises de imagens; Aquisição de informações geoespaciais de diferentes fontes; Processamento de dados geográficos; Elaboração de mapas; Reuniões de acompanhamento com clientes/apresentações de resultados; Controlar, gerir e distribuir atividades durante as fases de planejamento, implementação e operação de projetos. , Imprescindível ter experiência com detecção de manchas de óleo no mar; Formação Mestrado e/ou Doutorado na área de Sensoriamento Remoto; Graduação em Engenharia Ambiental e áreas correlatas; Experiência com Tecnologia SAR; Experiência em pesquisa (por meio de artigos e trabalhos acadêmicos, de conferências, entre outros); Conhecimento de sensoriamento remoto aplicado e interpretação de imagens.

Be comfortable navigating the following technology stack: Python3, Pyspark, scripting (Bash/Python), Hadoop, SQL, S3 etc. Should be able to understand internals of ML models such as Random Forest, CNN, Regression models, etc Design, build, test and deploy new libraries, frameworks or full systems for our core systems while keeping to the highest standards of testing and code quality. Work with experienced engineers and product owners to identify and build tools to automate many large-scale data management / analysis tasks. We believe in end-to-end ownership; this role will involve taking ML models to production at a scale. What You’ll need to Succeed: Bachelor’s degree in computer science /information systems/engineering/related field 8+ years of experience in software engineering with a minimum of 4+ years in ML Good experience in Pyspark Expert level understanding of Python with design patterns and object-oriented programming. Experience debugging and reasoning about production issues is desirable. A good understanding of data architecture principles preferred. Any other experience with Big Data technologies / tools SQL experience Analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience. Systems administration skills in Linux A strong engineering driven mindset will be required to succeed in this role. jobs_description: Em Financial Services (FSO), estamos construindo um mundo de negócios melhor apoiando as necessidades e desafios dos nossos clientes do segmento financeiro (Mercado de Capitais, Bancos, Seguros e Gestão de Ativos) através de uma única área/linha de serviço que une nossas diferentes especialidades (Auditoria, Consultoria, Tecnologia, etc) para atender este setor de forma abrangente e customizada. Qual será o seu papel nesse propósito? Como uma pessoa Consultor em PLD você será parte da área de Negócios para Serviços Financeiros atuando em projetos de Compliance com foco em Seguradoras. A modalidade de contratação será por tempo determinado de 6 meses, com possibilidade de prorrogação e efetivação. Nessa oportunidade você atuará assumindo as seguintes responsabilidades: Auxilio na preparação de modelos, cenários e indicadores e processos com possíveis indícios de lavagem de dinheiro envolvendo a empresa; Auxilio nas pesquisas, análises, montagem de dossiês, e emissão de pareceres envolvendo possíveis lavadores de dinheiro. Por que você? Se você possui os requisitos abaixo, essa oportunidade pode ser sua: Formação em Direito, Administração, Economia, Ciência da Computação, Análise de Dados; Conhecimento em ciência de Dados; Experiência em Seguradoras ou mercado financeiro; Conhecimento em fraudes em Seguros; Conhecimento em PLDFT. Poderá ser um diferencial, caso você tenha os seguintes requisitos: Experiência com legislações aplicáveis ao Mercado Segurador O que oferecemos: Vale Alimentação, Vale Refeição, Vale Transporte, Plano de saúde, Assistência odontológica, Universidade Corporativa e outros benefícios Educacionais, Gympass, e muito mais. Clique aqui e conheça nosso universo de benefícios. Quem somos: Somos uma das maiores empresas de serviços do mundo, em Auditoria, Consultoria, Impostos, Estratégia e Transações, orientados à Tecnologia. Com presença em mais de 150 países, aqui você terá a oportunidade de viver as experiências excepcionais que só a EY pode oferecer, com alcance global, cultura inclusiva e tecnologia para se tornar a sua melhor versão. Aqui, acreditamos que a força que impulsiona a inovação vem da diversidade de pessoas e ideias. Segundo o Grate Place to Work 2022, somos a melhor empresa para pessoas LGBTQ+ do Brasil, e a 2a melhor empresa para Mulheres e para Pessoas Pretas. Assim, você poderá fazer parte de nossos programas e grupos que, juntos a inúmeras iniciativas internas, apoiam nossa constante busca pela equidade. Quer se sentir desafiado/a, motivado/a e valorizado/a todos os dias? Inspirar mudanças e deixar um legado? Faça parte do nosso time e ajude-nos na construção de um mundo de negócios melhor! Saiba mais sobre como é trabalhar na EY: Carreiras na EY LinkedIn: @EY Instagram: @eybrasilcarreiras #FSOEY

jobs_description: Launchpad, a people-first technology company, is a leader in North America´s rapidly growing tech sector. Through two solutions, Launchpad supports its clients with digital transformation: PaasportTM, our iPaaS solution, streamlines software integration and automates workflows. Nearshore Staff Augmentation, our managed IT staffing service, connects top IT talent across various geographical regions, bringing industry expertise to leading clients. Based in Vancouver, Canada, our operational footprint spans across North and South America, with a second headquarters in Santiago, Chile. In 2023, our unwavering dedication to innovation garnered recognition as a Deloitte Technology Fast 50™ Program Company. Our clientele boasts industry leaders such as Walmart, GM, TIME Magazine, Salesforce, Tableau, Splunk, Bolt.com, Freedom House, and more. At Launchpad, we genuinely care about our people as individuals. If you are looking for a team that values growth, drive, and passion for your craft, if you’re seeking a place to achieve your goals and dreams with fairness and integrity, then we’d love to hear from you. This is a temporary role, that will work in a 3 to 6 month contract** Key Responsibilities: Architectural Design: Design and implement scalable and efficient data storage and analytics solutions using Snowflake. Develop and maintain the overall Snowflake architecture, ensuring alignment with business goals and data requirements. Performance Optimization: Implement best practices to optimize Snowflake performance and ensure efficient data processing. Collaborate with development teams to fine-tune queries and optimize data pipelines. Scalability and Capacity Planning: Assess system scalability and plan for future growth, ensuring the Snowflake platform can meet evolving business needs. Conduct capacity planning exercises to anticipate and address data storage and processing requirements. Security and Compliance: Implement and maintain robust security measures to safeguard data within the Snowflake environment. Ensure compliance with data governance and regulatory standards. Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, data scientists, and operations, to understand requirements and provide technical guidance. Communicate effectively with stakeholders to share insights, progress, and recommendations related to the Snowflake architecture. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Proven experience as a Snowflake Architect or similar role. In-depth knowledge of Snowflake architecture, features, and best practices. Strong expertise in SQL, data modeling, and ETL processes. Experience with cloud platforms, preferably AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Effective communication and collaboration abilities. Preferred Skills: Snowflake certification. Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and methodologies. Experience with other data warehousing solutions and technologies. Why work for Launchpad? 100% remote People first culture Excellent compensation in US Dollars Work with global teams and prominent brands based in North America, Europe, and Asia ...and more! At Launchpad, we genuinely care about our people as individuals. If you are looking for a team that values growth, drive, and passion for your craft, if you’re seeking a place to achieve your goals and dreams with fairness and integrity, then you are the future of Launchpad. Launchpad is committed to fostering a diverse and representative workforce and an inclusive work environment where all employees are respected and treated equally. Are you ready to elevate your career at Launchpad? We want to hear your story! Contact us today.

jobs_description: ADP Ventures is hiring a Lead Data Scientist. Does the thought of working with one of the most comprehensive employment data sets in the US excite you? Are you inspired by transformation and making an impact on the lives of millions of people every day? Well, this may be the role for you. Ready to design what is next? The ADP Ventures is a new business incubator, maturing ideas into new businesses and startups that will help our clients navigate the world of work. You will be working on a cross-functional team located in Porto Alegre, Brazil but with peers at our New York City office. As a member of the ASTRA team, you'll find that innovation is at the heart of everything we do. Embedded within the Ventures team, our mission is to leverage artificial intelligence to pioneer new pathways and solutions across a diverse range of products. With a commitment to excellence and a forward-thinking mindset, we are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what is possible in AI, ensuring that we not only meet the needs of today but also anticipate and shape the future. Every day you will work on a global team with multiple stakeholders to identify, design, develop, and implement advanced analytics projects that assist our clients daily. You will work with your team to provide, interpret, and predict necessary metrics for decision-making. You will code with machine learning tools like Python, AWS, and ML (Machine Learning) techniques, to synthesize millions of data sets into patterns that answer ad hoc requests and generate valuable insights for our clients. Your work will focus on creating and refining state-of-the-art recommendation and conversation engines. Also, to research the latest developments in AI research and technology, actively incorporating new techniques and approaches to maintain our leadership in innovation. To thrive in this career, you should know how to identify errors and reactively fix them. You will need to have some formal education in quantitative analytics and know design patterns and data structures. You have the skills to leverage existing models or create new models using the technologies above. But given the scale of our data sets and the complex problems we give you to solve, you will stay challenged and engaged with years of exciting projects ahead—all while growing your skills and progressing in a rewarding career. Like what you see? Apply now! What You'll Do Learn more about ADP at tech.adp.com/careers Here is what you can expect on a typical day: Innovative Recommendation & Language Solutions. Your journey begins by leveraging your expertise in Recommendation Systems, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Conversation Engines, enriched by your solid background in Advanced Analytics & Predictive Modeling. You'll confront complex challenges through adept analytical questioning, data extraction and analysis from varied sources, leading to the distillation of crucial insights. Advanced Analytics & Predictive Modeling. From the outset, your ability to synthesize insights into compelling narratives, complemented by visual representations and actionable recommendations, will be instrumental in pioneering innovative solutions in recommendation and language technologies. This expertise not only sets the foundation for success but also positions you as a key player in driving forward-thinking outcomes —this will set you up for success on Day 1. Own and Manage Projects. You will identify, design, develop, and implement advanced analytical projects. Limitless Possibilities. You will continue learning and discovering new ways to leverage ADP data to create new products and services and find more insights. You are passionate about learning and applying new techniques within data science that lead to innovations. Collaboration and Communication. You will be part of a collaborative team, listening to needs, then finding and sharing solutions. You are comfortable and skilled at presenting to both peers and leadership on your projects and findings. Experience. With at least 8 years of hands-on experience in Recommendation Engines, NLP, and/or Conversation Systems, you bring a wealth of knowledge and a track record of impactful contributions in similar roles. Your experience acts as a cornerstone for innovative problem-solving and thought leadership within our team. To Succeed In This Role Bachelor's degree in computer science, Statistics, Engineering, or a related field; Strong experience in relevant skills gained and developed in the same or similar role; Advanced English skills (able to interact daily with a distributed team); Fluency in Python - including popular data science packages (pandas, sklearn, etc) and quality tests; Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms and methods used in the data science field; Experience with Machine Learning model development and deployment; Knowledge of Natural Language Processing and Conversation Engines; Experience with Recommendation systems; Knowledge with Cloud solutions (AWS, GCP, Azure); Interest in LLMs, Generative AI and Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG); Willing to work with ML Ops and Software Development activities as well. Bonus Points For These Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, or a related field, with a strong focus on AI and Machine Learning; Good understanding of Software Engineering; Exposure to Jupyter notebooks and/or Databricks platform; Experience with AWS cloud solutions (S3, Glue, Lambda, SageMaker); Experience with integrating data products (recommender systems, classifiers, chatbots, etc) into applications in production environments; Knowledge of Continuous Integration & Delivery methodologies; Experience with Vector Databases. You'll Love Working Here Because You Can Have courageous team collaboration. Courage comes from how associates are willing to have difficult conversations, speak up, be an owner, and challenge one another's ideas to find the best solution. Deliver at epic scale. We deliver real user outcomes using strong judgment and good instincts. We are obsessed with the art of achieving simplicity with a focus on client happiness and productivity. Be surrounded by curious learners. We align ourselves with other smart people in an environment where we grow and elevate one another to the next level. We encourage our associates to listen, stay agile, and learn from their mistakes. Act like an owner & doer. Mission-driven and committed to leading change, you will be encouraged to take on any challenge and solve complex problems. No tasks are beneath or too great for us. We are hands-on and willing to master our craft. Give back to others. Always do the right thing for our clients and our community and humbly give back to the community where we live and work. Support our associates in times of need through ADP's Philanthropic Foundation. Join a company committed to equality and equity. Our goal is to impact lasting change through our actions. What are you waiting for? Apply today! Find out why people come to ADP and why they stay: https://youtu.be/ODb8lxBrxrY (ADA version: https://youtu.be/IQjUCA8SOoA ) Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP: ADP is committed to an inclusive, diverse and equitable workplace, and is further committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic including: race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, protected veteran status or disability. Hiring decisions are based upon ADP’s operating needs, and applicant merit including, but not limited to, qualifications, experience, ability, availability, cooperation, and job performance. Ethics at ADP: ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Click https://jobs.adp.com/life-at-adp/ to learn more about ADP’s culture and our full set of values.

titulo: Senior Data Architect with Focus on Azure Data Lake and Snowflake.
jobs_description: Company Overview: Lean Tech is a rapidly expanding organization situated in Medellín, Colombia. We pride ourselves on possessing one of the most influential networks within software development and IT services for the entertainment, financial, and logistics sectors. Our corporate projections offer a multitude of opportunities for professionals to elevate their careers and experience substantial growth. Joining our team means engaging with expansive engineering teams across Latin America and the United States, contributing to cutting-edge developments in multiple industries.We seek a Senior Solutions Architect with a solid English level to join our team. Here are the challenges that our next warrior will face and the requirements we look for: Position Title: Senior Solutions Architect Location: Remote What You Will Be Doing: Communication/Collaboration: Effectively communicate and present technical designs, solutions, and architectures to executives in a concise manner. Demonstrate excellent communication and stakeholder management skills with peer-level, executive, and all engineering levels. Be responsive, flexible, creative, open to change, and have a high degree of initiative. Work across the enterprise to understand dependencies with other applications, cross-team solutions, and enterprise best practices and direction. Proactively break down silos to envision and co-create products with cross-team, cross-company communication and collaboration. Ensure an open and collaborative technical environment with other Solution Architects, Enterprise Architects, and Engineers. Work independently and collaboratively with a team(s). Solution Domain: Demonstrate strong conceptual and problem-solving skills. Know the details of the entire solution's architecture, topology, and integrations. Understand what tools are used, processes in place, failover strategies, and environment/connectivity patterns. Understand the interdependencies of the team's solutions with other enterprise applications. Document topology/solution architecture for current state, as well as topology/solution for future state. Provide proposed arch designs/patterns/diagrams for new solution integrations. Document decisions/designs via ADRs. Understand the broader ecosystem and how business processes work. Incorporate this knowledge and connect the dots for the engineers. Technical Domain: Follow roadmap/product roadmap and releases of vendor technology used by their team. Understand when new functionality is becoming available, how it could impact/improve team solutions as well as overall solution architecture. Work with vendors to articulate additional product enhancements needed or desired. Influence product roadmaps. Work with vendors to articulate product issues/challenges, help teams to get to resolution. Have hands-on working knowledge of coding languages that the teams utilize. Have extensive experience and knowledge with technologies and products the teams utilize or will need to utilize. Stay up to date with these technologies through training and research. Investigate new technologies and techniques and research ongoing industry developments through a partnership with the Enterprise Architecture team. Partner with the leadership team in identifying gaps and providing improvement strategies to foster continuous improvement. Ability to dive into the code and propose recommendations to an issue or adjustments as needed. Engage in critical support situations and effectively, efficiently, and quickly drive to successful resolutions. Ensure teams are documenting and following best practices around security, data access, design standards, and coding standards. Propose and guardrails to monitor/enforce adherence. Ensure teams designs and processes are reusable and eliminate redundancy. Planning/Budget: Partner with the manager for financial planning and budgeting for technology investments and software expenses. Provide input and guidance to ensure cost management and spend on technology. Support talent identification, growth plans/opportunities, mentors. Create/maintain technology roadmaps (short and long term) - looking at future tech solutions (or plan b items), technical debt to address, future arch states and improvements to help meet business needs. Ability to turn vague concepts into actionable work groupings that the team can further refine and break down. Evaluate the ROI of systems development and enhancements to the IT Enterprise environment and effectively weigh the financial alternatives involved with various technical solutions and proposals. Contracts/Proof of Concepts(POC): Can create, lead, and execute POCs as needed. Including identification of POC Success criteria/score carding, and leading vendor assessments and discussions Ability to review technical components of a legal contract and provide insights/recommended change or updates Requirements & Qualifications: Platform is Snowflake and Azure Data Factory Can be able to “whiteboard” on solution architecture and roll up sleeves on hands-on engineering Exposure to enterprise architecture and integrations, familiarity with ADRs, and relevant product enhancement knowledge. -Proven experience in solution architecture preferably in Snowflake and Azure Data Factory platforms. Excellent hands-on technical skills in coding languages. Extensive experience in cloud systems, data architecture, and pipeline design. Strong knowledge of contemporary technology trends through training and research. Proficiency in creating and executing POCs. Certifications in Snowflake and Azure Data Factory platform would be advantageous. Ability to handle contracts and provide technical insights. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills. Why you will love Lean Tech: Join a powerful tech workforce and help us change the world through technology Professional development opportunities with international customers Collaborative work environment Career path and mentorship programs that will lead to new levels. Join Lean Tech and contribute to shaping the data landscape within a dynamic and growing organization. Your skills will be honed, and your contributions will play a vital role in our continued success. Lean Tech is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

jobs_description: Job Summary The Senior Salesforce Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex Salesforce-based solutions to support the organization's business processes. This role requires deep expertise in Salesforce development, customization, and integration, as well as the ability to lead and mentor a team of developers. You’ll Have The Opportunity To Salesforce Development: Design, develop, test, and deploy high-quality Salesforce solutions, including custom applications, configurations, and enhancements. Customization: Customize Salesforce applications to meet specific business requirements, including creating custom objects, fields, workflows, and validation rules. Integration: Integrate Salesforce with other systems and applications, both on-premises and cloud-based, using technologies like REST and SOAP APIs. Data Management: Manage data import, export, and migration tasks, ensuring data quality and integrity within Salesforce. Security and Access Control: Implement and maintain robust security and access controls to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements. Code Optimization: Write efficient, well-structured, and maintainable Apex code, Visualforce pages, and Lightning components to maximize system performance. Problem Solving: Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues and provide solutions to address user problems and system errors. Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation for all Salesforce customizations, processes, and integrations. Best Practices: Stay up to date with Salesforce best practices and new features, and recommend their implementation to improve system efficiency. Team Leadership: Lead and mentor junior Salesforce developers, provide technical guidance, and foster a collaborative and productive team environment. Project Management: Collaborate with project managers, business analysts, and other stakeholders to deliver projects on time and within budget. Testing and Quality Assurance: Develop and execute test plans, perform code reviews, and ensure the quality and reliability of Salesforce solutions. YOU’LL THRIVE IN THIS ROLE IF YOU HAVE THE FOLLOWING SKILLS AND QUALITIES: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). Salesforce certifications, such as Salesforce Certified Platform Developer I and II, are highly desirable. 10+ years of proven experience as a Senior Salesforce Developer with a track record of successful project implementations in a similar sized company. Proficiency in Salesforce development tools, including Apex, Visualforce, Lightning components, and SOQL. Strong understanding of Salesforce architecture, data model, and security model. Experience with Salesforce integration techniques and technologies. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Knowledge of Agile development methodologies. Familiarity with industry-specific regulations and compliance requirements (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR, SOX). Ability to communicate with internal and external stakeholders outside of Quebec or unilingual English-speaking on a daily basis. A Senior Salesforce Developer is a key player in leveraging Salesforce to drive business success, and they are expected to have advanced skills and the ability to guide and mentor junior team members. ACKNOWLEDGING THE POWER OF DIVERSITY BRP is dedicated to nurturing a culture that invites, connects, and propels the ambitions of people of all backgrounds, profiles, beliefs and experiences. Ultimately, the diversity and uniqueness of our people fuel our ingenuity and set the course for the path ahead! For this reason, we value diversity and we strive to always push each other forward to build an inclusive workplace where every employee feels like they belong, where they can grow and find meaning WELCOME TO BRP We’re a world leader in recreational vehicles and boats, creating innovative ways to move on snow, water, asphalt, dirt and even in the air. Headquartered in the Canadian town of Valcourt, Quebec, our company is rooted in a spirit of ingenuity and intense customer focus. Today, we operate manufacturing facilities in Canada, the United States, Mexico, Finland, Australia and Austria, with a workforce made up of close to 23,000 spirited people, all driven by the deeply held belief that at work, as with life itself, it’s not about the destination; It’s about the journey. This position is based in Campinas, Brazil. Resumes In English Will Be Preferred. This position is eligible to the BRP Employee Referral Program.

jobs_description: Job Description: Um pouco sobre a Trouw Líder global em nutrição animal, a Trouw Nutrition é especializada no desenvolvimento de tecnologias de alimentação inovadoras, premixes e soluções de software exclusivas. Qualidade, inovação e sustentabilidade são os nossos princípios orientadores - desde a pesquisa até produtos, modelos e serviços de ponta. Tudo projetado para otimizar a nutrição animal. Quais são os desafios do Coordenador de Business Intelligence Latam? Com reporte ao Gerente de Business Service, o Coordenador de Business Intelligence LATAM desempenha um papel fundamental ao liderar e coordenar uma equipe de profissionais qualificados, combinando expertise técnica em análise de dados com uma compreensão aguçada do mercado e insights empresariais. É também responsável por impulsionar decisões orientadas por dados, utilizando ferramentas avançadas e capitalizando a inteligência de negócios para fornecer insights à equipe de liderança nível Latam. Esta posição exige uma habilidade única de conseguir combinar conhecimentos técnicos e com uma visão estratégica para otimizar os processos decisórios e impulsionar o sucesso organizacional. Atribuições: Colaborar com as partes interessadas para entender as demandas de negócio e supervisionar o desenvolvimento de relatórios e dashboards eficazes que atendam às necessidades de áreas estratégicas. Liderar e coordenar a equipe de BI. Oferecer orientação, mentoria e apoio aos membros da equipe para garantir a execução bem-sucedida de projetos. Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com líderes de negócios para compreender metas e objetivos organizacionais. Traduzir requisitos empresariais em soluções de dados. Análise e Interpretação: Realizar análises críticas dos dados para identificar tendências, padrões e insights. Apoiar na tomada de decisões estratégicas com base no resultado destas análises. Colaborar com diversas áreas tais como: Vendas, Marketing, Finanças e Operações para identificar oportunidades de melhorias e eficiências orientadas por dados. Possuir um background técnico em ferramentas e habilidades como Power BI, SQL, Data Warehousing e processos ETL. Supervisionar o desenvolvimento e a manutenção de pipelines de dados, modelos de dados e painéis para garantir precisão e acessibilidade dos dados. Estabelecer e manter políticas e procedimentos de governança de dados para garantir a qualidade, a consistência e a segurança deles. Assegurar conformidade com regulamentações de privacidade de dados (LGPD). Requisitos Formação Acadêmica: Ensino Superior Completo em Ciência da Computação, Ciência de Dados ou áreas afins. Idiomas: Inglês avançado (mandatório), espanhol intermediário (desejável). Tempo de Experiência: Sólido background em inteligência de negócios, análise de dados ou uma função relacionada, além de possuir no mínimo 3 anos de experiência em gestão de pessoas. (mandatório) Ferramentas: Proficiência em habilidades técnicas como Power BI, SQL, Azure, Data Warehouse e processos ETL. Localidade: Campinas- SP. Modalidade: Atuação Híbrida no Office de Campinas, com disponibilidade para eventuais viagens em todo território nacional. Perfil Fortes habilidades de compreensão de negócios e capacidade de traduzir dados em insights acionáveis. Our organisation: Trouw Nutrition is the global leader in innovative feed specialties, premixes and nutritional services for the animal nutrition industry. The unique combination of products, models and services Trouw Nutrition offers, boosts productivity and supports animal health through all life stages, contributing to our customers' peace of mind. Trouw Nutrition's nutrition solutions have met the need of farmers and home-mixers, feed producers, integrators and distributors. Trouw Nutrition has locations in 25 countries and around 5000 employees. Our mission is Feeding the Future. jobs_description: At Bain we say “Champion the bold to achieve the extraordinary”. At the Advanced Analytics Group (AAG) we deeply embody that statement; we put remarkable data innovators in front of the world's toughest challenges, delivering impact that goes way beyond businesses. By doing that, we aim to challenge the status quo and redefine the domains in which we work. We are building the most influential data innovation hub in South America. We are looking for creative yet courageous professionals like you to play a key role in helping us pursue this endeavor. What can you expect from us? We are people centered and team players: we want to provide an awesome environment to work and grow. An environment where we care about people, our wellbeing and a healthy and vibrant long term development. We believe in a place where autonomy is at the core, and where servant leadership provides direction, guidance and motivation, enabling the best version of each of us so we can build teams based on trust and where we help others shine. We deliver positive impact and challenge the status quo: we are obsessed with unleashing our clients’ full potential by developing quick and dirty data products that evolve fast through agile experimentation. We design a vision not conquered yet, and we only seek to make it a reality and bring true impact to the domains we work on. Be it a very complex operational mining process, an NGO’s educational challenge, a retailer’s e-commerce, or a climate change endeavor, we bring state-of-the-art advanced analytics techniques to create new superior realities for our clients. We are playful and seek for uniqueness: complex problems require thinking out-of-the-box, giving room to challenging ideas and points of view. How we enable that? By nurturing creativity and having fun exploring novel paths and promoting curiosity and learning in empowered teams that take seriously their instincts and passions. We’ve seen over and over again that this never-ending learning philosophy make us better and stronger, broaden our capability range and enlighten our version in the future to tackle challenges that we haven’t seen before. Software Engineer @ Bain We are looking for a Software Engineer to join Bain’s Advanced Analytics Group (AAG). As part of AAG, you will work with other members of AAG, Bain Generalist Consultants and our AAG Factory team to build robust software solutions that interact with our Data Science and Machine Learning models to serve our clients’ needs. We achieve this in two distinct ways: Working with consulting teams on short-term projects which involve developing software solutions Developing and maintaining long-lasting products that support internal or clients’ needs At Bain, we work with leading companies innovating with data, often involving building digital products. Many times, in the early stages of experimentation, we have to develop immature digital products as proofs of concept. Those can go from deploying a micro service with a predictive model, to quickly implementing a new component and A/B testing on a production app with millions of users. When any of those tests show potential value, we need to scale them up and help the team capture that unlocked value. Sometimes, this means transforming an immature digital product into a stable, usable, and resilient one that delivers a great UX. For all that, we are searching for innovative and fresh minds that want to join us to create elegant yet practical solutions to deal with the most challenging problems. Who we are looking for We are not looking for an expert on a certain programming language or a specific technology. Instead, we are seeking people who have strong Software Engineering experience and feel comfortable moving through different types of projects. We are looking for developers with experience in backend and frontend, that are able to give a software engineering point of view for new product developments. They don't need to be an expert in every single area of the development process, but to know how those components interact and apply methodologies that adapt to the reality of each project. Maybe you have already worked with some specific backend framework, and you rule with that, but we need and want you to be able to learn new things as you move forward. We want you to think that learning something new is a fun challenge rather than a chore. What we expect from you is to: Enjoy learning new programming languages Fluency in one of the following programming languages – Python, JavaScript, Ruby Experience developing web APIs Experience with web frontend framework Use Git as your main tool for versioning and collaborating Experience of using cloud - GCP or AWS Coordinate with Data Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers Have 2 or more years of experience We are interested in you working with a multidisciplinary team where there are other roles who code and for you to be a reference regarding software engineering. Also, we need you to feel comfortable at every stage of a project: whether you are putting together a prototype of a crazy idea (that we don’t know what it’s going to evolve into), building production software or taking charge, of the continuous improvement of an ongoing product. We’d love if: You are a curious person. You are obsessed by learning new things, tackling new problems and being constantly challenged. You describe yourself as a proactive and creative person. You don’t feel bad facing failure, instead you learn the reason behind it and learn from it. You value learning from others, but you also love learning by yourself and teaching yourself new skills. You value when things are well-written, so you put your best effort on it. Be it code, documentation or an email. You feel comfortable reading, writing and speaking in English. You speak Spanish or Portuguese (⭐️ if you dominate both). You have strong communication skills and feel comfortable working with people that have different roles and seniority levels. You enjoy working on constantly iterative processes. You embrace a deep respect for diversity. Benefits 4 days week. Apple equipment. Maternity and Paternity leave: birth and non-birth parents will be eligible to receive 26 weeks* of paid leave. Life and medical insurance. Supplementary Health and Dental Insurance. Yearly bonus based on performance. Leave of Absence: unpaid break of 1-12 months (eligible after 1 year working with us). Gympass: experience fitness and wellness with gyms, studios and apps. Headspace: annual free subscription to the app that will provide Meditation and mindfulness for any mind, any mood, any goal. Language study subsidy (Spanish, Portuguese and English). By law, maternity leave in Chile can reach 30 weeks of paid leave. Note: some benefits may differ depending on location and could be subject to change. ABOUT US Bain & Company is a global consultancy that helps the world’s most ambitious change makers define the future. Across 62 cities in 37 countries, we work alongside our clients as one team with a shared ambition to achieve extraordinary results, outperform the competition, and redefine industries. We complement our tailored, integrated expertise with a vibrant ecosystem of digital innovators to deliver better, faster, and more enduring outcomes. Our 10-year commitment to invest more than $1 billion in pro bono services brings our talent, expertise, and insight to organizations tackling today’s urgent challenges in education, racial equity, social justice, economic development, and the environment. Since our founding in 1973, we have measured our success by the success of our clients, and we proudly maintain the highest level of client advocacy in the industry.

jobs_description: About The Role Sr. Staff Engineers at Uber have an impact across a variety of business and technology decisions spanning projects and locations. We are passionate and pragmatic technologists who are able to design scalable systems while deliver efficient code. We are humble teachers, technically mentoring a team of talented engineers while also executing on delivering uniquely ambitious projects! As a Staff Engineer on the Engineering team in Brazil, you will be an early member of Uber's first development center in LATAM. What You'll Do Leads efforts within the organization to drive the development and maintenance of backend services and solutions to support user-facing products, downstream services, or infrastructure tools and platforms used across Uber. The work you do will initially focus on advanced technologies to improve safety around the world, such as advanced telematics, machine learning, high scale distributed systems, real time data processing and mobile development, among others. Minimum Qualifications PhD or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or related field OR + 10 -years full-time Software Engineering work experience. Programming language (e.g. C, C++, Java, Python, or Go) Technical skills: Distributed systems Product engineering Scalability engineering About our teams Grocery Uber is redefining the future of grocery & retail. A company that started by transporting people from place to place, now transports nearly anything a customer could want or need, on-demand. The Grocery Engineering Team is responsible for ensuring that as we move to transport more than just people & restaurant food, our platform evolves to provide a best-in-class experience for customers, earners and brands. Today this team is focused on grocery, but will continue to flex into a longer tail of categories in the future.

jobs_description: Sobre a Área A tecnologia no BTG vem contribuindo com as grandes transformações do banco. Para isso, investimos em tudo que há de mais novo no mercado. Trabalhamos com times ágeis, DevOps com integração contínua, automação de deploy e automação de testes, além do nosso desenvolvimento ser direcionado para arquitetura multicloud. Você vai ter proximidade com o negócio e abertura para trazer novas ideias e soluções. Liberdade para pesquisar e implementar novas linguagens, novos padrões de desenvolvimento e metodologias. Nosso time é responsável pelo desenvolvimento de soluções para gerenciamento e análise da performance de fundos e carteiras de investimentos, sistemas chamados BTG Solutions e BTG Solutions Analytics; voltados principalmente para área de Wealth Management. Somos focados em entrega eficiente e robusta de novas funcionalidades. Suporte das plataformas para garantir a alta disponibilidade e performance dos sistemas. Levantamento de requisitos e proposta de novas soluções para o negócio. Vale Alimentação e Vale Refeição. Seguro Saúde e Odontológico. Auxílio Creche. Vale Transporte. Gympass. Planos por adesão como Previdência Privada e Seguro de Vida. Programa de Apoio Pessoal.

titulo: Tech Lead, Software Engineering, People with Disabilities
jobs_description: Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and promotes affirmative actions as an employer. This requisition is a pipeline effort to generate the People with Disabilities community interest in opportunities at Google. All candidates with disabilities will be evaluated for this role in compliance with the provisions of Article 93 Federal Labor Law 8.213/91. Please provide documentation that attest your disability. Please merge it in your resume PDF. O Google tem orgulho em ser um local de trabalho inclusivo. Somente as candidaturas de Pessoas com Deficiência (PcD) serão avaliadas para essa vaga, em conformidade com o disposto no artigo 93 da Lei Federal do Trabalho de número 8.213/91. Pedimos, por gentileza, que a pessoa candidata envie o currículo em inglês, e forneça documentação que comprove sua deficiência. A documentação pode ser enviada junto ao currículo, no mesmo PDF. Please submit your resume in English - we can only consider applications submitted in this language. Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following: São Paulo, State of São Paulo, Brazil; Belo Horizonte, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil . Minimum qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related field, or equivalent practical experience. 8 years of experience in software development, and with data structures/algorithms. 5 years of experience testing, and launching software products, and 3 years of experience with software design and architecture. Ability to communicate in English and Portuguese fluently. Preferred qualifications: 4 years of experience in a technical leadership role. 2 years of experience managing teams of software engineers. Experience designing and implementing any of the following: large-scale distributed systems, APIs used by other developers, Search Ranking systems, ML (Machine Learning) systems. About The Job Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward. Google is an engineering company at heart. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on users around the world. At Google, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, social to local, Google engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another. Responsibilities Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve software. Research, conceive, and develop software applications to extend and improve on Google's product offering. Collaborate on scalability issues involving access to data and information. Manage individual and team priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

jobs_description: Company Description At ServiceNow, our technology makes the world work for everyone, and our people make it possible. We move fast because the world can’t wait, and we innovate in ways no one else can for our customers and communities. By joining ServiceNow, you are part of an ambitious team of change makers who have a restless curiosity and a drive for ingenuity. We know that your best work happens when you live your best life and share your unique talents, so we do everything we can to make that possible. We dream big together, supporting each other to make our individual and collective dreams come true. The future is ours, and it starts with you. With more than 7,700+ customers, we serve approximately 85% of the Fortune 500®, and we're proud to be one of FORTUNE 100 Best Companies to Work For® and World's Most Admired Companies™. Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow. Unsure if you meet all the qualifications of a job description but are deeply excited about the role? We still encourage you to apply! At ServiceNow, we are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all voices are heard, valued, and respected. We welcome all candidates, including individuals from non-traditional, varied backgrounds, that might not come from a typical path connected to this role. We believe skills and experience are transferrable, and the desire to dream big makes for great candidates. Job Description ServiceNow is seeking Enterprise Architects to join our Team. The Enterprise Architecture Team is part of our pre-sales organization focused on building credibility and trust with the technical leaders in our largest customers by developing cross-functional strategies and solutions. Our team brings technical expertise, real-world experience, strong executive engagement skills and an inspirational mindset to help our customers understand the opportunities of the “platform of platforms” vision. We act as technical leaders for our customers most complex solutions, designed to ensure that they can realize the value they need. We do this by leveraging best practice and industry standards to build customer trust and architect best in class solutions. While collaborating with customers, partners, and the wider ServiceNow sales team, the right candidate will create and communicate high-level architectures and strategies that are both written and verbal, to audiences up to and including the CIO/CTO level. The Enterprise Architect will elegantly articulate the advantage of ServiceNow being built on a single cloud platform consisting of a single user interface, one code base and one data model. The Enterprise Architect will also lead and participate in the delivery of workshops, best practice overviews, and educational sessions to existing customers and partners. What You Get To Do In This Role Engage with customer executives to identify pain points and opportunities to deliver value and then translate them into solutions from ServiceNow Work with a wide variety of customers, colleagues and partners to help them understand the power of the Now platform and the potential opportunities of the future of work Lead architecture and design engagements to demonstrate how ServiceNow meets the needs of strategic customers, including; IT Transformation, Digital Products/Services, Platform as a Service, Enterprise Service Management, and the co-creation of industry specific solutions. Understand the business strategy of the customer and articulate how ServiceNow can enable and deliver value to their organization, seamlessly integrating into their current and future technology landscape Understand the detail behind the ServiceNow and platform of platforms architecture and communicate it at various levels Work with architecture development methods, modelling approaches and architecture patterns for integration Interact at multiple levels within a customer account (Enterprise Architects, Domain Architects, Directors, VPs, and CXOs) and maintain these relationships throughout their customer journey. Provide thought leadership and collaborate with internal ServiceNow business units Identify, lead and contribute to the creation of best practices, white papers, workshops, etc Qualifications To be successful in this role you have: Passion and energy for building business relationships and is accustomed to driving the simplification of complex concepts into compelling customer proposals Drive for results using out-of-the-box innovative thinking together with excellent problem-solving skills An intrinsic ability to understand and prioritize work and is willing to make big bets when the time is right, to invest time and energy in the right areas. Willingness to jump-in and roll-up their sleeves alongside customers, colleagues and partners to get things done faster and better. 10 or more years of proven success in influencing senior technology leaders to drive change in a pre-sales, customer, or delivery focused role. A track record of success in using Human Centered Design techniques to explore the customers current reality and set a vision for the future. Expertise designing, implementing and managing advanced architectures in an application domain and integrating multiple systems or platforms Experience with Enterprise Architecture or Application Architecture pre-sales in a software vendor or professional services environment. Familiarity with common Enterprise and Industry Architecture frameworks such as: TOGAF, Zachman, IT4IT, BIAN, TMForum, etc. Excellent understanding of the architectural principles for cloud-based platforms that include SaaS, PaaS, multi-tenancy, and automation Experience and understanding of multiple technical domains - application, data, DevOps, AI/ML, integration, big data, mobility, analytics, etc. Intrinsically curious and passionate about researching current and emerging technologies and developing innovative solutions Experience presenting architecture concepts, designs, and goals to technology leaders and partners TR21 Additional Information ServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status or any other category protected by law. At ServiceNow, we lead with flexibility and trust in our distributed world of work. Click here to learn about our work personas: flexible, remote and required-in-office. If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you may contact us at talent.acquisition@servicenow.com for assistance. For positions requiring access to technical data subject to export control regulations, including Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may have to obtain export licensing approval from the U.S. Government for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by the U.S. Government. Please Note: Fraudulent job postings/job scams are increasingly common. Click here to learn what to watch out for and how to protect yourself. All genuine ServiceNow job postings can be found through the ServiceNow Careers site. From Fortune. © 2022 Fortune Media IP Limited All rights reserved. Used under license. Fortune and Fortune Media IP Limited are not affiliated with, and do not endorse products or services of, ServiceNow.

titulo: Especialista de Soluçoes em Modelo de Mix de Mídia ( MMM)
qtd_candidatos: Seja uma das primeiras pessoas a se candidatar
jobs_description: Na Dell, nós nos dedicamos a reinventar nossas estratégias de marketing para que elas se concentrem em uma abordagem focada no cliente e orientada por dados, aproveitando a tecnologia de ponta para garantir que as comunicações sejam direcionadas, personalizadas e eficientes. Parte integrante dessa missão é nosso compromisso com a modernização da mídia por meio de iniciativas inovadoras, incluindo nossa transição para um futuro sem cookies. Como uma empresa global com produtos inovadores, sempre há espaço para a Dell Technologies aumentar as vendas e expandir a participação no mercado. Portanto, cientistas de dados altamente qualificados são essenciais para entender nosso desempenho de mídia. Desenvolvemos e implementamos abordagens estatísticas para quantificar nosso impacto na mídia, usando soluções e tecnologias que colocam nossos produtos e serviços na vanguarda da mente de nossos clientes. Sempre pronta para ajustar as estratégias em resposta às mudanças do mercado e à concorrência, nossa equipe trabalha em estreita colaboração com a equipe de marketing Go To Market e parceiros externos. Resumo do perfil da vaga: Cientista de dados com experiência prática em Marketing/Media Mix Model (MMM), especificamente em ambientes B2B e B2C, e com conhecimento de abordagens de atribuição. O que você conseguirá Como consultor sênior de ciência de dados,com prática em ( MMM) você será responsável por contribuir com a estratégia de negócios e influenciar a tomada de decisões com base nas informações obtidas por meio de análises aprofundadas. Você produzirá recomendações acionáveis e convincentes ao interpretar insights de conjuntos de dados complexos. Você projetará processos para consolidar e examinar dados não estruturados para gerar percepções acionáveis. Também fará parcerias com líderes de negócios, engenheiros e especialistas do setor para criar modelos preditivos, algoritmos e mecanismos de probabilidade. Você Irá Atuar como Cientista de dados da MMM para ajudar a apoiar e melhorar nossas abordagens B2B e B2C. Aplicar técnicas de modelagem para desafiar o status quo; contribuir para refinar o MMM a fim de otimizar a alocação de gastos com mídia nos segmentos B2B e B2C; Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com outros membros da equipe e partes interessadas para garantir o alinhamento da nossa estratégia com as metas e os objetivos comerciais. Desenvolver e aplicar uma ampla gama de técnicas e teorias de estatística, aprendizado de máquina e inteligência comercial para fornecer insights comerciais acionáveis Desenvolver e conduzir testes de eficácia de algoritmos para diferentes casos de uso analítico Dê o primeiro passo em direção à carreira de seus sonhos Cada Membro Da Equipe Da Dell Technologies Traz Algo Único Para a Mesa. Veja a Seguir o Que Estamos Procurando Para Esta Função Requisitos essenciais Mestrado em Estatística, Matemática, Análise de Dados ou em um campo quantitativo relacionado Experiência como cientista de dados e experiência em análise de marketing, e na criação de modelos estatísticos em análise de marketing Experiência com SQL e bancos de dados relacionais, criação e ajuste de consultas (SQL), bem como familiaridade com uma variedade de bancos de dados, incluindo Hadoop/Hive. Confortável com plataformas baseadas em nuvem (AWS, Azure, Google) Experiência com uma ou mais linguagens de software de ciência de dados (Python, R, SAS) Capacidade comprovada de implementar modelos de aprendizado de máquina do ambiente de pesquisa (Jupyter Notebooks) para a produção por meio de abordagens procedimentais ou de pipeline.
